Affectionate
Timid
Rowdy

Indolent

Pride
Pride
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by councillors and noblemen, being groomed for rulership. Common trait outcomes for this Focus are §YHaughty§! and §YBrooding§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]由内阁成员和贵族教导，准备成为统治者。此重心通常的特质结果是 §Y自大§!和 §Y沉思§!。

original: Humility
Humility
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by servants at court, focusing on service and humility. Common trait outcomes for this Focus are §YTimid§! and §YAffectionate§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]在宫廷中由仆人教导，专注于服侍与谦逊。此重心通常的特质结果是§Y怯懦§!和§Y亲切§!。

original: Duty
Duty
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by guards and retainers at court, focusing on duty and diligence. A common trait outcome for this Focus is §YConscientious§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]在宫廷中由守卫与随从教导，专注于使命与勤勉。此焦点通常的特质结果是§Y尽责§!。

original: Etiquette
Etiquette
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by councillors and other courtiers, focusing on courteous behavior and etiquette. Common trait outcomes for this Focus are §YPlayful§! and §YIndolent§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]由内阁成员与其他廷臣教导，专注于彬彬有礼的举止与礼仪。此重心通常的特质结果是§Y调皮§!和§Y懒散§!。

original: Thrift
Thrift
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by artisans and merchants, focusing on mathematics and invention. Common trait outcomes for this Focus are §YCurious§! and §YFussy§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]由工匠和商人教导，专注于数学与发明。此重心通常的特质结果是§Y好奇§!和§Y挑剔§!。

original: Faith
Faith
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by priests, focusing on the §Y[This.Educator.Religion.GetName]§! faith and religious learning. A common trait outcome for this Focus is §YIdolizer§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]由神职人员教导，专注于§Y[This.Educator.Religion.GetName]§!信仰与宗教学习。此重心通常的特质结果是§Y狂信者§!。

original: Struggle
Struggle

[This.GetTitledFirstName] is very loosely tutored, chiefly being left to [This.GetHerHis] own devices and competing with other children. Common trait outcomes for this Focus are §YRowdy§! and §YWillful§!.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]受到非常宽松的教导，多半是被大人放在一边不管，用[This.GetHerHis]本事与其他孩子竞争。此重心通常的特质结果是§Y粗暴§!和§Y任性§!。

original: Heritage
Heritage

[This.GetTitledFirstName] is tutored by various courtiers and family members, focusing on assimilating §Y[This.Educator.Culture.GetName]§! culture and the §Y[This.Educator.Religion.GetName]§! faith. No specific traits are associated with this Focus.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]由许多不同的廷臣与家庭成员教导，专注于接受§Y[This.Educator.Culture.GetName]§!文化与§Y[This.Educator.Religion.GetName]§!信仰。这个重心没有特定的特质。

original: Diplomacy
Diplomatic Education

[This.GetTitledFirstName] focuses [This.GetHerHis] studies on the ways of diplomacy and statesmanship.\n§GAffectionate§! and §GCurious§! children will do better with this education, while §RWillful§! and §RFussy§! children will be hampered.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将[This.GetHerHis]学习重心放在外交与政治手腕上。\n§G亲切§!与§G好奇§!的孩子会在这种教育上做的更好，而§R任性§!与§R挑剔§!的孩子会受到阻碍。

original: Martial
Martial Education

[This.GetTitledFirstName] focuses [This.GetHerHis] studies on the ways of military strategy and war.\n§GRowdy§! and §GWillful§! children will do better with this education, while §RTimid§! children and §RIdolizers§! will be hampered.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将[This.GetHerHis]学习重心放在军事战略与战争之道上。\n§G粗暴§!与§G任性§!的孩子会在这种教育上做的更好，而§R怯懦§!的孩子与§R狂信者§!会受到阻碍。

original: Stewardship

[This.GetTitledFirstName] focuses [This.GetHerHis] studies on bookkeeping and administration.\n§GBrooding§! and §GConscientious§! children will do better with this education, while §RIndolent§! and §RHaughty§! children will be hampered.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将[This.GetHerHis]学习重心放在簿记与行政管理上。\n§G沉思§!与§G尽责§!的孩子会在这种教育上做的更好，而§R懒惰§!与§R骄傲§!的孩子会受到阻碍。

original: Stewardship Education
Intrigue
Intrigue Education

[This.GetTitledFirstName] focuses [This.GetHerHis] studies on the ways of intrigue and acting in the shadows.\n§GPlayful§! and §GFussy§! children will do better with this education, while §RRowdy§! and §RAffectionate§! children will be hampered.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将[This.GetHerHis]学习重心放在密谋与暗中行动上。\n§G调皮§!与§G挑剔§!的孩子会在这种教育上表现得更好，而§R粗暴§!与§R亲切§!的孩子会受到阻碍。

original: Learning
Learning Education

[This.GetTitledFirstName] focuses [This.GetHerHis] studies on learning, philosophy and religion.\n§GTimid§! children and §GIdolizers§! will do better with this education, while §RBrooding§! and §RPlayful§! children will be hampered.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将[This.GetHerHis]学习重心放在学问、哲学与宗教上。\n§G怯懦§!的孩子与§G狂信者§!会在这种教育上表现得更好，而§R沉思§!与§R调皮§!的孩子会受到阻碍。

original: Silence is Golden
This character wisely chose to keep quiet.
translation: 这个角色明智地选择了保持沉默。

original: I've come across [haughty_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] kissing one of the servant folk in a hallway.
translation: 我无意中发现[haughty_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]在走廊里与一名庶民仆人亲吻。

original: It's inappropriate, and I will tell [haughty_events_char_1.GetHerHim]!
It's our secret, right?
Walking across the yard, I see [haughty_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName] angrily beating a dog with a heavy stick.
translation: 穿过院子时，我看见[haughty_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName]愤怒地用一根沉重的棍子在打狗。

original: Walking outside, I come upon some commoners along the road. One of them calls out, saying I look lovely today.
translation: 在外面散步时，我在路上偶遇了一些平民。他们其中一个大声叫唤，说我今天看起来很可爱。

original: I'll see him punished for addressing me like that!
translation: 我会看到他因这么跟我说话受到惩罚的！

original: I'll nod and accept the compliment graciously.
translation: 我会优雅地点点头接受恭维。

original: Peasants get angry.
Peasants are subdued.
I'll pick up a stick and beat [haughty_events_char_1.GetHerHim] instead!
translation: 相反我会捡起一根棍子来打[haughty_events_char_1.GetHerHim]！

original: I think I'll join in!
As I'm spending a pleasant moment alone with the attractive cook, the wretched child [From.GetFirstName] comes upon us and promptly starts chiding me about morals!
translation: 当我正与诱人的厨师度过一个愉快的时刻时，那讨厌的孩子[From.GetFirstName]碰见了我们并立刻以道德指责我！

original: As I'm spending a pleasant moment alone with the attractive cook, young [From.GetFirstName] comes upon us. However, [From.GetSheHe] only winks in complicity and sneaks away.
translation: 当我正与诱人的厨师度过一个愉快的时刻时，年轻的[From.GetFirstName]碰见了我们。然而，[From.GetSheHe]只是对我们眨了眨眼就溜走了。

original: I'll catch the brat and give [From.GetHerHim] a good hiding!
translation: 我会抓住这个小鬼并让[From.GetHerHim]好看的！

original: It doesn't matter.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] didn't take kindly to my chiding. [From.GetSheHeCap] caught me and gave me a good beating.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]没有诚恳地接受我的指责。[From.GetSheHeCap]抓住我并狠揍了我一顿。

original: The [GetRootFromInsult]! I will tell everyone!
I'll hide so [From.GetSheHe] doesn't find me again.
translation: 我会躲好不让[From.GetSheHe]再找到我。

original: [From.GetFirstName], the [GetRootFromInsult], went around and told everyone lies about me, as childish revenge for the deserved beating I gave [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，那个 [GetRootFromInsult]，在周围向所有人散播关于我的谎言，作为我给予[From.GetHerHim]应得的敲打的幼稚报复。

original: As I turned, the dog bit me in the ankle and [From.GetFirstName] managed to get away, but has since been skulking around eyeing me with hatred.
translation: 当我转过身的时候，狗咬住了我的脚踝，[From.GetFirstName]趁机跑走了，但是之后他就在附近满怀怨恨地偷偷盯着我。

original: As I'm beating a rabid dog in the yard, the little cur [From.GetFirstName] runs up and starts hitting me with a stick.
translation: 当我在院子里打一条疯狗时，那个小坏蛋[From.GetFirstName]跑过来并开始用棍子打我。

original: As I'm beating a rabid dog in the yard, little [From.GetFirstName] runs up and joins in the beating.
translation: 当我在院子里打一条疯狗时，小[From.GetFirstName]跑过来加入到殴打中。

original: I'll show the [GetRootFromInsult]!
How weak, how adorable.
There's room for everyone.
As I hit [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetTitledFirstName] turned [From.GetHerHis] anger on me but I managed to escape as the dog bit [From.GetHerHim] in the ankle.
translation: 当我在打[From.GetHerHim]时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]向我表达了[From.GetHerHis]愤怒，但当狗咬向[From.GetHerHim]脚踝时我设法避开了。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] will find I am a fierce enemy!
Now, where are my toys...?
translation: 那么现在，我的玩具在哪……？

original: Complicity
Contempt
My treatment of that uppity peasant had the unfortunate effect of making more of them angry.
translation: 我对这些傲慢的农民的处理产生了使他们更生气的不幸的结果。

original: My treatment of that uppity peasant really put him and the others in their place.
translation: 我对这些傲慢的农民的处理真的让他和其他人服服帖帖。

original: We'll deal with them as they deserve.
translation: 我们会给予他们应得的。

original: I know how to handle these things.
translation: 我知道如何处理这些事情。

original: I am practically an adult now, and people had better listen to me if they know what's good for them.
translation: 现在我实际上已经是个成年人了，如果他们识大体的话，那最好听从于我。

original: Rules are for the weak. I know what I want.
translation: 规则是用于弱者的。我明白自己要什么。

original: I know my worth, and people had better not stand in my way.
translation: 我知道自己的价值，其他人最好不要挡我的道。

original: I shall bow to no one.
And I know where to get it.
translation: 而且我知道在哪里可以得到它。

original: If they protest I will crush them.
translation: 如果他们反对，我会碾碎他们。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing strong tendencies towards prideful behavior.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]对高傲的举止表现出强烈的倾向。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing an arbitrary streak. It's showing more clearly every day.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]正在发展出专断的性格。每一天都表现得更明显。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing much petty cruelty towards others.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]展现了残暴待人的迹象。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should show more ambition.
It's fine, I don't need more competition.
translation: 很好，我不需要更多的竞争者。

original: Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Ambitious.
translation: 让[From.GetFirstName]变得野心勃勃的机会。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards pride and has told me that I should show more ambition.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不喜欢我变得傲慢的趋势并告诉我应该显示出更多的野心。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards arbitrariness and has told me that I should show more ambition.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不喜欢我变得专断的趋势并告诉我应该显示出更多的野心。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards cruelty and has told me that I should show more ambition.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不喜欢我变得残忍的趋势并告诉我应该显示出更多的野心。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right - I am destined for greatness.
[From.GetSheHeCap] can't tell me what to do!
Yes, [From.GetTitledFirstName]'.
[From.GetSheHeCap]'ll be lucky if I don't poison [From.GetHerHis] food.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]很幸运，如果我不在[From.GetHerHis]食物里下毒。

original: I find that it brings me great joy to bring joy to others.
translation: 我发现给予他人快乐会给我带来极大的快乐。

original: I get on well with others, while some people only chase ambitions and get into needless conflicts.
translation: 我和别人相处得很好，而有些人只追求野心并卷入不必要的冲突中。

original: I have learned that most people are kind, and it brings no benefit to walk with mistrust and suspicion.
translation: 我知道大多数人是善良的，而不信任与猜疑不会带来任何好处。

original: Kindness binds us all together.
translation: 善良把我们联结在一起。

original: I have what I need right here.
Why would anyone want to harm me?
translation: 为什么会有人想要伤害我？

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing a kind disposition towards others.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]正在发展出一种和蔼的对待他人的性格。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is very easily satisfied and obviously lacking in ambition.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]很容易满足而且明显缺乏野心。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to trust everyone, lacking any notion of the evil in man.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]似乎信任每一个人，缺乏任何对人性之恶的概念。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should be more charitable.
[From.GetSheHeCap] can only be [From.GetHerselfHimself].
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Charitable.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] appreciates my kind disposition but thinks I could do even more to help others.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]非常赞赏我善良的性格，但认为我应该更多地去帮助别人。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] thinks I am being too passive and would like me to do more to help others in need.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]觉得我太被动了，并且想让我更多的去帮助有困难的人。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] would like me to be less naive and make more efforts to actually help others.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]希望我天真一点并付出更多的努力帮助别人。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should do more.
I will try.
I help when I can, but rarely see a need.
translation: 当我可以的时候会去帮忙，但很少看到一个有需要的人。

original: But the [Root.TopLiege.GetTitle] provides for all, surely?
As I keep getting older, I find that humility comes naturally to me.
translation: 当我年纪越来越大，我发现我生而谦卑。

original: I've always felt more comfortable being silent and letting others talk.
translation: 我一直觉得保持沉默并让他人说话会让我更加舒服。

original: As I learn more about life, I find it is generally wise to stay out of danger as much as possible.
translation: 当我更加了解人生之后，我发现尽可能远离危险通常是明智的。

original: I should avoid the dangers of pride.
translation: 我应该避免傲慢的危险。

original: There is no need to be noisy.
Only the foolish take risks.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing a demeanor of natural humility.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]正显现出自然谦卑的风度。

original: I have observed that young [From.GetFirstName] usually tries to stay out of the way of others.
translation: 我察觉到年轻的[From.GetFirstName]通常会试图远离他人。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to constantly avoid taking any risks.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]似乎总是避免承担任何风险。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] shouldn't try so hard.
All is as it should be.
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Content.
translation: 让[From.GetFirstName]变得安于现状的机会。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says I shouldn't try so hard to be humble but instead just be myself.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我不应该那么努力着谦虚而是做回我自己。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says I am too shy and should try to relax more and just be myself among people.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我太害羞了，应该试着放松并自己走进人群当中。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says I am too fearful and should try to relax more and just be myself
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我太害怕了，应该试着放松并做回我自己

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should let go of it.
I'm not trying, it's who I am.
translation: 我不会努力尝试，我就是这样。

original: I'd rather be myself by myself.
There is nothing wrong with being cautious.
I like to climb, wrestle and run - and as I grow older I am beginning to notice that I am physically stronger than others.
translation: 我喜欢爬高、摔跤和跑步——当我长大后我开始注意到我的身体比其他人强壮。

original: I like to play hard and talk straight. I have no time for nonsense.
translation: 我喜欢努力做事与直言不讳。我没时间废话。

original: Playing outside and scratching my knees has taught me to act quickly without unnecessary pause for thinking.
translation: 在室外玩耍划伤膝盖让我学会了行动果断不假思索。

original: It feels good to be strong!
I will always speak my mind.
Thinking was never my strong side anyway!
translation: 思考从来不是我的强项！

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] loves physical games and is developing a strong physique.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]喜欢体育游戏并发展出强壮的体格。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] plays hard and talks straight.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]干活卖力并且直言不讳。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing tendencies to be more of a doer than a thinker. Yes, that would be a kind way to describe it...
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]正显露出相比思考者更像执行者的趋势。是的，这种说法比较好听……

original: I should focus on teaching [From.GetHerHim] bravery.
translation: 我应该专注于教会[From.GetHerHim]勇敢。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should do [From.GetHerHis] own thing.
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Brave.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sees that I am growing stronger but tries to encourage me to be more courageous.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]除了发现我越来越强壮以外还试图鼓励我变得更勇敢。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] appreciates my honest ways but tries to encourage me to be more courageous.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]除了赞赏我的诚实以外还试图鼓励我变得更勇敢。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says I need to put more thought into my actions, but without compromising my physical courage.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我要在行动时多加考虑，但同时不影响我肉体的勇气。

original: Yes, I want to be brave like [From.GetHerHim]!
My strength is all I need.
translation: 我的力量就是我需要的一切。

original: Honestly, I don't care.
I don't even know what that means.
translation: 我甚至不知道这是什么意思。

original: I've read about the great [Root.GetMenWomen] in history, and someday I want to be like them.
translation: 我阅读了历史上伟大的[Root.GetMenWomen]的事迹，终有一天我要像他们一样。

original: I know what I can do and have no reason to be afraid of anything.
translation: 我知道我能做什么而且没有理由害怕任何东西。

original: I've learned that if I put my mind to something I will usually get it.
translation: 我学会了如果我用心去做通常就会做到。

original: I will be the greatest.
What is there to fear? Nothing.
I was just born stubborn.
[From.GetFirstName] is developing into an ambitious young [From.GetManWoman].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]正成长为一个野心勃勃的年轻[From.GetManWoman]。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is more and more becoming known for [From.GetHerHis] great bravery.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]正在因[From.GetHerHis]伟大的勇气而越来越有名。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing a stubborn streak.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]正显现出顽固的倾向。

original: I should teach [From.GetHerHim] to be more proud instead.
translation: 我应该教会[From.GetHerHim]对自己更有信心。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] could never be like me anyway.
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Proud.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says that my ambition is good but [From.GetSheHe] thinks I should be more proud of what I have.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我的雄心是好的但[From.GetSheHe]认为我应该更加骄傲。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my bravery but thinks I should be more proud of my achievements.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认可我的勇敢但认为我应该对自己的成就更加骄傲。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should be proud of what I have but try to be less stubborn.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我应该为自己所拥有的而骄傲但我应该试着不那么顽固。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should be proud!
But I don't have enough!
I have nothing yet, but [Root.GetSheHe] who dares wins!
translation: 我还什么都没有，但[Root.GetSheHe]敢赢我试试！

original: I'll decide for myself, thank you.
The more I think about it, the more I see that fairness and justice are things worth striving for.
translation: 我越想越觉得公平与正义才是值得奋斗的事情。

original: The world is full of things that make me angry.
translation: 这世间太多事让我愤怒。

original: The more I think about it, the more I see how things are wrongfully denied me.
translation: 我越想越觉得他们不把东西都给我，这很不公平。

original: It's what separates us from the wild beasts.
translation: 这就是我们和兽类的不同之处。

original: I can't stand it sometimes!
It should all be mine.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to think a lot about justice, fairness and righting the many wrongs in the world.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]似乎思考过很多关于公正，平等以及导正这世界的事情。

original: I have noticed that young [From.GetFirstName] seems to carry a lot of anger around.
translation: 我已经注意到年轻的[From.GetFirstName]似乎带着许多怒气。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be envious of everything and everyone.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看上去对所有人所有事都带着羡慕嫉妒恨的情绪。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should learn temperance.
I should resist the temptation to intervene.
translation: 我应当抗拒干预的诱惑。

original: Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Temperate.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should not speak so much of righting the wrongs of others.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得我不该讲太多别人的闲话。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should learn to better temper my anger.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得我应该学会更好地控制情绪。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should learn to temper my envy.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我应该学习压制自己的嫉妒心理。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should calm down.
It would be wrong to not care!
translation: 漠不关心才是最大的错误！

original: I don't care what that [GetRootFromInsult] thinks!
translation: 我才不鸟那个[GetRootFromInsult]会怎么想！

original: That's easy for [From.GetHerHim] to say!
I don't need many things - I can share what I have.
translation: 我不需要这么多东西——我可以分享我的。

original: There are so many things in the world that are just not worth expending energy on.
translation: 世间有太多麻烦的事情不值得耗费精力。

original: I find there is nothing that pleases me so much as just sitting down for hours, eating.
translation: 我发现最能让我愉悦的就是坐在餐桌前几个小时猛吃不停。

original: It's not worth the effort accumulating things anyway.
translation: 反正不值得耗费精力积累这些东西。

original: It's true of almost everyhing, really.
translation: 这对几乎所有一切都适用，真的。

original: It is truly the ultimate good in life.
translation: 这真是人生中最终极的幸福。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to always be willing to share.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来愿意一直分享。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be showing more and more signs of laziness.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来表现出越来越多懒惰的迹象。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] never stops eating, always staying longer than anyone at the table.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]一直不停的吃，比别人坐在餐桌前的时间都要长。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should get out more and talk to people.
Ah, the young will be as they are!
translation: 啊，年轻人终究会有年轻人的样子！

original: Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Gregarious.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I should talk more to people, give them more of myself.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我应该更多地和人交谈，表达自己。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should get out more and talk to people.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我该更多外出与人交谈。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I spend too much time eating and should pause to converse once in a while.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得我花在吃上面的时间太多了，应当不时停下来与人聊聊。

original: Very well, I'll make the effort!
I'd rather give them my things.
translation: 我愿意给他们我的想法。

original: Why bother?
I'd rather not talk with food in my mouth.
translation: 我更愿意嘴里有东西的时候不讲话。

original: I've always loved playing with others - and I still do!
translation: 我一直都喜欢跟人一起玩——一直都是！

original: I love fun and games, but the best game of all is the one of tricking people into doing things for me.
translation: 我喜欢玩跟游戏，但是最好的游戏就是利用别人替自己做事！

original: Playing games and pranks is the best fun! I do think I never want to grow up.
translation: 玩游戏跟恶作剧最有意思了！我觉得我永远不想长大。

original: And people seem to like me.
translation: 而且人们似乎都喜欢我。

original: I pull the strings.
The world is made of pixie dust!
translation: 世界由精灵的仙尘组成！

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to have a natural charm and way with words.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来有种天然的魅力和语言技巧。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be developing a rather devious and manipulative streak.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来正在发展出一种狡诈且喜爱操纵别人的个性。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to often react in erratic and strange ways in perfectly everyday situations. There is something not quite right there...
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来经常在日常生活中表现出不稳定跟诡异的行为，肯定有哪里不对劲……

original: I shall beat it out of [From.GetHerHim]!
I'm sure [From.GetSheHe] will suffer in life.
translation: 我确定[From.GetSheHe]会在生活中受苦。

original: Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Cruel.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] does not approve of my open and talkative nature and decided to beat it out of me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]并不认同我大方并且爱聊的天性，并决定要逼我改掉这个性格。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not approve of my cleverness and cunning and decided to beat it out of me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]并不认同我的聪明和滑头，并决定要逼我改掉这个性格。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I am too 'strange' and decided to beat it out of me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我太「古怪」了，并决定要逼我改掉这个性格。

original: One day I'll do the same unto others.
translation: 总有一天我也要对别人做同样的事情。

original: I'll speak of [From.GetHerHis] cruelty to everyone!
translation: 我会跟所有人谈到[From.GetHerHis]残忍！

original: I'll let [From.GetHerHim] think it's working.
translation: 我会让[From.GetHerHim]以为这正在起作用。

original: But I was invisible the whole time.
I've always been one to finish my chores properly. And those of others.
translation: 我永远是那个妥当完成自己琐事的那个人。甚至包括别人的。

original: It's important to do things right, which includes not doing them too much.
translation: 做好工作很重要，其中就包括不要做得过多。

original: I just like getting things done.
translation: 我只是喜欢完成工作的感觉。

original: Self-control is the first step to greatness.
translation: 自控是通往伟大成功的第一步。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is full of energy and a will to get things done.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]充满活力并期待着完成工作。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] is impressing everyone with [From.GetHerHis] sensible choices and great capacity for self-restraint.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]令所有人刮目相看，[From.GetHerHis]抉择都很明智，自我约束力也很强。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should use that power for good.
Life will reward [From.GetHerHim].
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Just.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should employ my considerable energies toward just causes.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我应当把我可观的精力用在正义的事业上。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] commends me on my temperance and wisdom and wishes that I employ it in the service of just causes.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]表扬了我，因为我的自我克制和智慧，并希望我将其用在为正义事业的服务上。

original: Sage advice.
I already know what I want to do.
translation: 我已经知道我想做什么。

original: It's not wise to be overly zealous.
I love it when everything is in good order, and I'm willing to spend the time that it takes.
translation: 我喜欢一切都井井有条，我愿意花上必要的时间来达成这一切。

original: I love keeping an eye on things, and I love counting them. Coins especially.
translation: 我喜欢看着一些事物，而且我喜欢点算它们。尤其是硬币。

original: I know how things should be done, but I fear others are always trying to sabotage my efforts.
translation: 我知道有些事应当如何完成，但是我怕其他人一直会想破坏我的努力。

original: One shouldn't rush things needlessly.
translation: 一个人不应当在无谓的事情上浪费时间。

original: They are so shiny.
I must be wary of their envy.
translation: 我必须对他们的嫉妒表示警惕。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] loves keeping [From.GetHerHis] things in order and patiently spends lots of time on it.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]喜欢让[From.GetHerHis]东西井然有序，并且耐心地花许多时间来整理。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to love ordering and counting things, coins especially.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来喜欢整理并点算一些事物，尤其是硬币。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] loves doing things [From.GetHerHis] own way, and often takes it personally and gets angry when others offer opinions.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]喜欢以[From.GetHerHis]自己的方式来做事，并常常往心里去，因为别人提供意见而勃然大怒。

original: I should help guide [From.GetHerHim] in the right direction.
translation: 我应当导正[From.GetHerHim]往正确的方向。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is a busy soul, just like me.
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Diligent.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my patient diligence but thinks I should be even more focused on the results of my efforts.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]赞许我持续的勤奋，但是认为我应当更加注重我努力的结果。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my active mind but thinks I spend too much time thinking about gold and silver.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]赞许我上进的心态，但是认为我花太多时间考虑真金白银。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says it's good that I have my own strong ideas, but [From.GetSheHe] wants me to focus more on the results of my actions than on worrying about the envy of others.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]说我有我自己强烈的观点是不错，但是[From.GetSheHe]要我更加注重我行为的结果，而不是担心别人的嫉妒。

original: I should be more like [From.GetHerHim].
Now, don't be hasty, [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName].
But gold is so pretty!
But they hate me!
Thinking about things, I have concluded that everything in the world is not as the priests say it is.
translation: 仔细思考世间万物之后，我得出结论：这个世界并不是神职人员所讲的那样。

original: There are people I know that follow different traditions than those of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. I have spoken to them and asked them about it, and now it doesn't seem so strange to me.
translation: 我认识一些人，他们对世界大看法和传统的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰并不一致。我跟他们聊天并询问相关的事情，现在我对他们的观点不再陌生。

original: I spend a lot of time exploring and thinking about how things work..
translation: 我花很多时间探索思考世界如何运转……

original: They are all liars!
We are all the same, I guess.
It feels great to learn!
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to have a lot of independent opinions and refuses to listen to the priests.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来有很多自己独立的观点，并且拒绝听神职人员的论调。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be taking a curious interest in other traditions than the [From.Religion.GetName] ones.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来对其他传统很有兴趣，而不是[From.Religion.GetName]的。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be a real explorer and experimenter, constantly finding new ideas and topics that fascinate [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]看起来是一个真正的探索家跟实验者，不断的发现吸引到[From.GetHerHim]的新点子和话题。

original: I should try to stop these tendencies..
translation: 我应当试着阻止这些倾向……

original: Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Patient.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should be less quick to question the words of the priests.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我不该太快质疑神职人员的说法。

original: I love studying foreign customs, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should look to my own virtues instead.
translation: 我喜欢学习模仿外国习俗，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得我该更加注重我们自己的价值美德。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to think I'm too clever for my own good, or so [From.GetSheHe] said.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]似乎觉得我聪明过头了，或者[From.GetSheHe]是这么说的。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should calm down.
But they are fools!
Is [From.GetSheHe] not interested in the world at all?
Too clever for [From.GetHerHim], maybe.
As I grow older, I increasingly find that my faith is a true fountain of strength.
translation: 随着年岁的增长，我渐渐地发现我的信仰实在是力量的真正源泉。

original: The more I hear of the words of the wise [Root.GetMenWomen] of old, the more I want to be like them.
translation: 听越多的智慧[Root.GetMenWomen]长者的话语，我越想跟他们一样。

original: It gives me great joy to admire the achievements of others. Especially as I am so weak myself.
translation: 倾慕别人的成就让我非常高兴。尤其是我自己是这么一个弱鸡。

original: And I praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
Only from knowledge comes true strength.
translation: 只有知识才是真正的力量。

original: They strike me with awe.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be developing very strong religious sentiments.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]似乎发展出非常强烈的宗教情感。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] often speaks in reverence of the wise [From.GetMenWomen] of old, saying [From.GetSheHe] wants to be like them.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]经常谈起他对智慧[From.GetMenWomen]长者的仰慕，说[From.GetSheHe]想跟他们一样。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be quick to praise the deeds of others around [From.GetHerHim], while neglecting [From.GetHerHis] own physical activity and development.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]似乎非常乐意褒扬[From.GetHerHim]身边人的行为，而忽略[From.GetHerHis]自己的活动和发展。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] should focus on helping others instead.
What a lovely child!
Chance of [From.GetFirstName] becoming Kind.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to think that I should replace my reverence for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] with love for my fellow man.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]似乎觉得我应该把对[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的崇敬换成对我的部下的爱护。

original: I worship the memory of the wise [From.GetMenWomen] of old, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that I should focus on loving the living around me instead.
translation: 我崇拜智慧的[From.GetMenWomen]长者的学识，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得我应该更加跟身边的同龄人深入交流。

original: I easily adore the virtues of others, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I'm too passive and should should focus more on helping people, lest I grow weak.
translation: 我会很轻易的仰慕他人的美德，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得我太被动了，应当更加注重帮助别人，免得长成一个弱者。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is right.
No, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is the greatest!
I shall love them when they have something interesting to say.
translation: 我应该爱戴他们，他们有讲很多有趣的事情。

original: I'm fine.
I have finished my education in diplomacy. I found the lessons rather tedious.
translation: 我修完了外交课程。我觉得真无聊。

original: I have finished my education in diplomacy. It is a fascinating subject.
translation: 我修完了外交课程。真是迷人的学科。

original: I have finished my education in diplomacy. I find that I have some talent for it.
translation: 我修完了外交课程。我觉得我自己在这上面有点天赋。

original: I have finished my education in diplomacy. I feel that I have truly found my calling.
translation: 我修完了外交课程。我感觉我真正找到天生我才为何用了。

original: Speak frankly and all will love you.
translation: 坦率交谈，所有人都会喜欢你。

original: Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment.
translation: 不要憎恨你的敌人。这种情绪会影响你的判断。

original: Speak softly and carry a big stick.
The best way to keep one's word is to not give it.
translation: 最好保持承诺的办法就是不做承诺。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in diplomacy. It turned out less well than expected.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]外交课程。结果不尽如人意。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in diplomacy. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has learned all the basic skills required.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]外交课程。看起来[From.GetSheHe]学会了所有的基础技巧。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in diplomacy. It is evident that [From.GetSheHe] has excelled in [From.GetHerHis] studies.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]外交课程。很明显[From.GetSheHe]在[From.GetHerHis]学习中表现出色。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in diplomacy. I notice with pride that [From.GetSheHe] has attained nothing less than a masterful level of knowledge.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]外交课程。我非常自豪地注意到[From.GetSheHe]已经掌握了相当于大师级别的知识。

original: Oh well.
Very good.
This pleases me.
I have finished my education in the ways of war. I found the lessons rather tedious.
translation: 我修完了战争课程。我觉得真无聊。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of war. It is a fascinating subject.
translation: 我修完了战争课程。真是迷人的学科。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of war. I find that I have some talent for it.
translation: 我修完了战争课程。我觉得我自己在这上面有点天赋。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of war. I feel that I have truly found my calling.
translation: 我修完了战争课程。我感觉我真正找到天生我才为何用了。

original: Courage is all a soldier needs.
translation: 战士所需要的一切就是勇气。

original: Know your enemy.
It is wise to attack the enemy's strategy.
translation: 攻击敌人的战略是明智的。

original: War is a continuation of politics.
Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of war. It turned out less well than expected.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]战争课程。结果不尽如人意。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of war. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has learned all the basic skills required.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]战争课程。看起来[From.GetSheHe]学会了所有的基础技巧。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of war. It is evident that [From.GetSheHe] has excelled in [From.GetHerHis] studies.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]战争课程。很明显[From.GetSheHe]在[From.GetHerHis]学习中表现出色。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of war. I notice with pride that [From.GetSheHe] has attained nothing less than a masterful level of knowledge.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]战争课程。我非常自豪地注意到[From.GetSheHe]已经掌握了相当于大师级别的知识。

original: I have finished my education in stewardship. I found the lessons rather tedious.
translation: 我修完了管理课程。我觉得真无聊。

original: I have finished my education in stewardship. It is a fascinating subject.
translation: 我修完了管理课程。真是迷人的学科。

original: I have finished my education in stewardship. I find that I have some talent for it.
translation: 我修完了管理课程。我觉得我自己在这上面有点天赋。

original: I have finished my education in stewardship. I feel that I have truly found my calling.
translation: 我修完了管理课程。我感觉我真正找到天生我才为何用了。

original: How hard can it be?
A coin saved is a coin earned.
translation: 省下一分钱等于多赚一分钱。

original: Accumulate! Accumulate!
Wealth is the slave of a wise man, and the master of a fool.
translation: 财富是聪明人的奴隶，也是蠢货的主人。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in stewardship. It turned out less well than expected.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]管理课程。结果不尽如人意。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in stewardship. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has learned all the basic skills required.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]管理课程。看起来[From.GetSheHe]学会了所有的基础技巧。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in stewardship. It is evident that [From.GetSheHe] has excelled in [From.GetHerHis] studies.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]管理课程。很明显[From.GetSheHe]在[From.GetHerHis]学习中表现出色。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in stewardship. I notice with pride that [From.GetSheHe] has attained nothing less than a masterful level of knowledge.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]管理课程。我非常自豪地注意到[From.GetSheHe]已经掌握了相当于大师级别的知识。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of intrigue. I found the lessons rather tedious.
translation: 我修完了计谋课程。我觉得真无聊。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of intrigue. It is a fascinating subject.
translation: 我修完了计谋课程。真是迷人的学科。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of intrigue. I find that I have some talent for it.
translation: 我修完了计谋课程。我觉得我自己在这上面有点天赋。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of intrigue. I feel that I have truly found my calling.
translation: 我修完了计谋课程。我感觉我真正找到天生我才为何用了。

original: Intrigue must be conducted with honor.
translation: 计谋必须在荣誉的前提下进行。

original: Never interrupt your enemy when [Root.GetSheHe] is making a mistake.
translation: 不要打断你的敌人，如果[Root.GetSheHe]正在犯错。

original: To subdue the enemy without fighting is supreme.
translation: 不战而屈人之兵，善之善者也。

original: Events which can not be prevented must be directed.
translation: 不能阻止的事情就应当好好引导。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of intrigue. It turned out less well than expected.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]计谋课程。结果不尽如人意。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of intrigue. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has learned all the basic skills required.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]计谋课程。看起来[From.GetSheHe]学会了所有的基础技巧。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of intrigue. It is evident that [From.GetSheHe] has excelled in [From.GetHerHis] studies.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]计谋课程。很明显[From.GetSheHe]在[From.GetHerHis]学习中表现出色。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of intrigue. I notice with pride that [From.GetSheHe] has attained nothing less than a masterful level of knowledge.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]计谋课程。我非常自豪地注意到[From.GetSheHe]已经掌握了相当于大师级别的知识。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of faith and learning. I found the lessons rather tedious.
translation: 我修完了信仰与学识课程。我觉得真无聊。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of faith and learning. It is a fascinating subject.
translation: 我修完了信仰与学识课程。真是迷人的学科。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of faith and learning. I find that I have some talent for it.
translation: 我修完了信仰与学识课程。我觉得我自己在这上面有点天赋。

original: I have finished my education in the ways of faith and learning. I feel that I have truly found my calling.
translation: 我修完了信仰与学识课程。我感觉我真正找到天生我才为何用了。

original: Learning is dull but important.
translation: 学习很枯燥，但是很重要。

original: The world is a book.
Learning never exhausts the mind.
translation: 学习不会枯竭你的心灵。

original: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
translation: 无书之屋如同魂不附体。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of faith and learning. It turned out less well than expected.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]信仰和学识课程。结果不尽如人意。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of faith and learning. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has learned all the basic skills required.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]信仰和学识课程。看起来[From.GetSheHe]学会了所有的基础技巧。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of faith and learning. It is evident that [From.GetSheHe] has excelled in [From.GetHerHis] studies.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]信仰和学识课程。很明显[From.GetSheHe]在[From.GetHerHis]学习中表现出色。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education in the ways of faith and learning. I notice with pride that [From.GetSheHe] has attained nothing less than a masterful level of knowledge.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]修完了[From.GetHerHis]信仰和学识课程。我非常自豪地注意到[From.GetSheHe]已经掌握了相当于大师级别的知识。

original: Mysterious Charm
This character doesn't talk much, but there is something interesting about them...
translation: 这名角色少言寡语，但身上有种有趣的……

original: I have seen [affectionate_events_char_1.GetFirstName] looking at my new wooden toy animals.
translation: 我看到了[affectionate_events_char_1.GetFirstName]看着我的新木头动物玩具。

original: My nannies are away and as I roam around the grounds I come upon [affectionate_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName]. [affectionate_events_char_1.GetSheHeCap] looks up and seems interested in conversation.
translation: 我的保姆都走了，我四处漫游，遇到了[affectionate_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName]。[affectionate_events_char_1.GetSheHeCap]看到了我，似乎有兴趣跟我交谈。

original: As I am out playing by myself and taking a break to eat some bread I brought from the kitchens, I suddenly notice a young peasant child staring at me. [Root.GetSheHeCap] looks hungry.
translation: 我正在自娱自乐，正准备休息，吃些从厨房带出来的面包，我忽然注意到一个年轻的农家小孩看着我。[Root.GetSheHeCap]看起来很饿。

original: I could let [affectionate_events_char_1.GetHerHim] play with them.
Yes, I have nicer toys than [affectionate_events_char_1.GetHerHim].
I'll talk to [affectionate_events_char_1.GetHerHim]!
I'll stick my tongue out at [affectionate_events_char_1.GetHerHim] and run away!
I'll share my bread with [Root.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我愿意跟[Root.GetHerHim]分享我的面包！

original: I'll leave before [Root.GetSheHe] tries to steal from me!
translation: 我要离开这里，免得[Root.GetSheHe]试图偷走我的东西！

original: You do a good deed.
You do a good deed, but someone sees you...
translation: 你干了件好事，但有人看见了你……

original: [From.GetFirstName] has much nicer toys than me, and [From.GetSheHe] asked me if I want to play with them.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的玩具比我的更好玩，而且[From.GetSheHe]问我是不是也想一起玩。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has really nice toys but [From.GetSheHe] won't share them with me.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]有很棒的玩具但[From.GetSheHe]不愿与我分享它们。

original: Young [From.GetTitledFirstName] just walked up to me today, striking up conversation. We ended up having a long talk, about a great many things.
translation: 年幼的[From.GetTitledFirstName]今天正巧与我相遇，我们便攀谈起来。两人促膝长谈，聊了很多趣事。

original: Young [From.GetTitledFirstName] just walked up to me today, and as I was about to greet [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetSheHe] just stuck [From.GetHerHis] tongue out and ran away...
translation: 年幼的[From.GetTitledFirstName]今天正巧与我相遇，我正准备问候[From.GetHerHim]时，[From.GetSheHe]吐了吐[From.GetHerHis]舌头然后跑开了……

original: Yes, that would be nice!
No, those toys are silly anyway!
translation: 不要，那些玩具简直蠢爆了！

original: I hate [From.GetHerHim]!
How nice!
Begone, [GetRootFromInsult]!
What a strange child.
[From.GetFirstName] and me played all day with my toys.
I talked for a long while with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] had many funny things to tell me and we had a really good time.
translation: 我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]聊了很久。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉了我很多趣闻，我们度过了一段愉快的时光。

original: You shared your bread with the peasant child, and then you played together for several hours before parting ways. [Root.GetSheHeCap] waved happily as [Root.GetSheHe] ran home.
translation: 你和乡下的孩子分享了你的面包，然后在分别前你们又在一起玩了好几个钟头。[Root.GetSheHeCap]在高兴的挥手告别之际踏上了[Root.GetSheHe]回家的路。

original: You shared your bread with the child and then you played together for a while, until your nannies came and angrily interrupted you. As your friend ran away, the nannies said they'd tell [Educator.GetTitledFirstName] that you had been bad.
translation: 你和那个孩子分享了你的面包后又一起玩了一阵，直到你的保姆们赶来并生气地打断了你。你的朋友跑开了，保姆们说她们会告诉 [Educator.GetTitledFirstName]说你已经变成了一个坏孩子。

original: It's so nice to share with others!
Let's play again soon!
translation: 我们过一两天再一起玩吧！

original: I want more friends like this!
translation: 我想要更多这样的朋友！

original: I'll come see you again tomorrow!
This was fun!
But [Root.GetSheHe] is my friend!
[From.GetFirstName] let me play with [From.GetHerHis] toys all day and it was so much fun.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]让我玩了[From.GetHerHis]玩具一整天而且超级有趣。

original: I spoke at length with [From.GetFirstName] about a great many things. We laughed a lot, and it seems I have made a new friend.
translation: 我和[From.GetFirstName]滔滔不绝的讲了很多趣事。我们笑的前仰后合，看起来我交到了一个新朋友。

original: Let's play again sometime!
translation: 我们今后有空再一起玩吧！

original: What a nice child!

I saw [timid_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName] being chided publicly for stealing food from the personal stores of the [Root.Liege.GetTitle], but I know [timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe] was elsewhere at the time.
translation: 我看见[timid_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName]被公开斥责偷了[Root.Liege.GetTitle]私人商店里的东西，但我知道[timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe]那时在其他地方。

original: [timid_events_char_1.GetFirstName] seems very nice. Maybe I should ask if [timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe] wants to play?
translation: [timid_events_char_1.GetFirstName]看上去不赖。或许我应该问问[timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe]是不是想要玩？

original: There's a big dinner feast tonight with many prominent people invited, and it has been decided that I shall perform a song in praise of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for the guests.
translation: 今晚的宴席上有应邀而来的各路名流，而且已经决定好要由我来为客人们演唱一首赞美[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的歌曲。

original: No one would listen to me anyway...
translation: 无论如何都不会有人听我的话……

original: I must speak up for [timid_events_char_1.GetHerHim]!
I'll wait a little, [timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe] could come to me...
Yes, we should play!
No way!
Yes, I will sing.
Guests are amused.
Guests are offended.

I was wrongfully accused of stealing fine foods from the personal stores of the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]. I also know that young [From.GetFirstName] can confirm I was elsewhere when it happened, but [From.GetSheHe] has refused to step forward and confirm my innocence.
translation: 我被诬告偷了[Root.Liege.GetTitle]私人商店里的高档食物。我也知道年幼的[From.GetFirstName]能够证明我当时不在场。但是[From.GetSheHe]拒绝出面证明我的清白。

original: I was strangely and wrongfully accused of stealing fine foods from the personal stores of the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]. However, young [From.GetFirstName] stepped forward to confirm that I was elsewhere at the time and so the suspicions against me were lifted.
translation: 我莫名被诬告偷了[Root.Liege.GetTitle]私人商店里的高档食物。但是，年幼的[From.GetFirstName]出面证实了我当时不在场从而化解了对我的怀疑。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seems to be checking me out, but doesn't come over and talk.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]好像正在打量着我，但并没有上前来与我搭话。

original: [From.GetFirstName] came over to me and said [From.GetSheHe] wanted us to be friends!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]走近我说[From.GetSheHe]希望我们能成为朋友！

original: The little wretch!
Alas, I cannot blame the child for being timid.
translation: 唉，我怎么能怪这孩子胆小呢。

original: All is good then!
I'll go and talk to [From.GetHerHim]!
What's [From.GetSheHe] staring at? It's annoying!
How nice!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is very angry with me for not speaking up in [From.GetHerHis] defence.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对于我没有为[From.GetHerHis]立场辩护而感到恼火。

original: [From.GetFirstName] came over and talked to me, asking if I wanted to be friends.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]上前来与我搭话，问我想不想和他做朋友。

original: A roar of laughter rolled through the hall when the guests were told that I had hid in a chest in order to avoid having to sing for them. Several of them then called me over and offered me food and candies.
translation: 当客人们得知我为了逃避唱歌而躲进了衣柜中这件事之后，整个宴会厅爆发出一阵哄笑。随后他们中很多人便把我招呼过去并塞给了我一些糖果和食物。

original: The guests were all very offended at my refusal to sing for them.
translation: 客人们对于我拒绝为他们唱歌这件事感到相当不满。

original: What? It's not my problem!
I should step forward now, it's not too late!
translation: 我现在应该出面，一切还不算太迟！

original: Umm... no, I have to go.
Yes, let's play!
Oh yes!
I don't care.
Since [From.GetFirstName] refused to defend me, many people think I'm a thief and I have lost prestige at court.
translation: 由于[From.GetFirstName]拒绝为我辩护，我被很多人认定为小偷并在法庭上失去了名誉。

original: [From.GetFirstName] eventually stepped forward to defend my honor.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]最终站出来捍卫了我的名誉。

original: I shall remember this.
I can tell it took courage to speak up.
translation: 我看得出来这番辩护需要相当大的勇气。

original: [rowdy_events_char_1.GetFirstName] is always so annoying. I think [rowdy_events_char_1.GetSheHe] tries to win against me in games just to spite me!
translation: [rowdy_events_char_1.GetFirstName]总是这么让人火大。我觉得[rowdy_events_char_1.GetSheHe]试图在游戏中击败我来使我难堪！

original: There are so many fun things to do, so many forbidden things. I wonder if [rowdy_events_char_1.GetFirstName] would like to join me in some fun pranks?
translation: 有很多有趣的事可做，很多被禁止的事。我很想知道[rowdy_events_char_1.GetFirstName]是不是愿意和我一起玩些有趣的恶作剧？

original: I'll tell [rowdy_events_char_1.GetHerHim] to stop!
The matter escalates...\n
It doesn't matter, [rowdy_events_char_1.GetSheHe] can win.
I'll ask [rowdy_events_char_1.GetHerHim]!
Or maybe we should just play dice instead.
translation: 或者我们就玩玩骰子算了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is angry with me because I am always winning against [From.GetHerHim] in games.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]生我的气是因为我总是在游戏里赢过[From.GetHerHim]。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seems content to let me win when we play games.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]似乎不介意在游戏中让我获胜。

original: [From.GetFirstName] excitedly asks me if I wanted to come along and do forbidden things, pranks and the like.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]兴奋地问我愿不愿意一起干点被禁止的事，诸如恶作剧一类的事。

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks me if I wanted to play dice.
I'll tell [From.GetHerHim] to get lost!
I'll just avoid [From.GetHerHim] from now on.
That's all fine then.
Yes!
No, I'm a good [Root.GetBoyGirl].
Sounds like fun!
[From.GetFirstName] got angry and told me to get lost!
[From.GetFirstName] joined me and we did all kinds of pranks and tricks, everything except summoning [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]加入了我的行列，我们干尽了所有的恶作剧把戏，就差没召唤[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]了！

original: [From.GetFirstName] didn't want to play.
What a shame.
Fist fiiiiight!
I'll walk away, it's not worth it.
translation: 我得离开这，这并不值得。

original: We should do this every day!
translation: 我们每天都该干这事儿！

original: That was fun, now let's play dice.
translation: 那很有趣，现在我们玩玩骰子吧。

original: [From.GetFirstName] went crazy and started a fist fight with me!
Me and [From.GetFirstName] did all kinds of crazy and forbidden things. It was fun!
translation: 我和[From.GetFirstName]干尽了所有被禁止的疯事。太有意思了！

original: Come on then, you [GetRootFromInsult]!
Let's do it again sometime!
translation: 有机会我们再来干一次这事！

original: Playing Dice
Playing dice successfully requires a sharp eye and a quick mind.
translation: 骰子玩的好得要有敏锐的目光和迅捷的思维。

original: We are playing outside today, and several of the other children are daring me to climb the tallest watchtower.
translation: 我们今天在外面玩耍，很多孩子问我敢不敢接受挑战爬上最高的瞭望塔。

original: I'm not afraid!
Slipped while climbing.
Up and down like a squirrel.
translation: 像只松鼠一样上下自如。

original: No... it's too high.
I rapidly climbed up to the top of the tower. But when climbing down again, I slipped. The fall was very painful, but luckily I wasn't very high up.
translation: 我迅速的爬上了塔顶。但当我原路返回时，脚底滑了一下。这一跤摔得很疼，所幸我摔下来的地方不算高。

original: Agile as a squirrel, I rapidly climbed up the tower and then down again. Everyone was very impressed.
translation: 我如同松鼠一般敏捷，迅速地爬上了塔顶后又返回了地面，给每个人都留下了深刻的印象。

original: Owww!
Ha!
Languishing in the dungeon, I have realized that there is someone in the cell next to me. I can hear [event_ze_12230_prisoner.GetHerHim] sighing, coughing and complaining sometimes.
translation: 我被囚禁在这地牢之中，意识到隔壁的牢房中似乎有人。我能听到[event_ze_12230_prisoner.GetHerHim]时而叹息，时而咳嗽或发牢骚的声音。

original: I'll try and talk to [event_ze_12230_prisoner.GetHerHim]!
What's the point?
Languishing in the dungeon, I suddenly one day hear a small voice calling to me. It seems there is a young child in the cell next to mine...
translation: 我被囚禁在这地牢之中，突然有一天我听到有一个微弱的声音在叫我。似乎有个孩子被关在了我隔壁的牢房……

original: Languishing in the dungeon, I suddenly one day hear a voice calling out. It seems there is another child in these dungeons, in the cell next to mine...
translation: 我被囚禁在这地牢之中，突然有一天我听到有一个声音在叫我。似乎有另一个孩子也被关在了这些牢房中，应该就在我的牢房隔壁……

original: Finally someone to talk to!
translation: 终于又能够交流的人了！

original: I have no need for friends here.
It turns out that my fellow prisoner's name is [From.GetTitledName]. We have had many whispered conversations in the darkness, quickly becoming friends under these dismal circumstances.
translation: 看来我的狱友名叫[From.GetTitledName]。在这沉闷黑暗的环境中我们小声交流着，并很快成为了朋友。

original: I feel less lonely now.
translation: 现在我感觉没那么孤独了。

original: My attemps to make contact with the other prisoner were met only with silence.
translation: 我试图联系另一位囚犯，结果只换来了沉默。

original: Everybody hates me.
Pet Rat
This character has befriended a rat in the dungeon.
translation: 此人在地牢中与鼠为伴。

original: Languishing in the dungeon, you have recently made a new friend. It's a small, scruffy rat that keeps coming up to you and cuddling up in your lap.
translation: 你被囚禁在这地牢之中，最近交到了一个新朋友。一只又小又脏的老鼠，它每天都来找你并蜷缩在你的腿上。

original: I name you Flipper.
I name you Cuddles.
I name you Smelly.
Hello, food...

Recently, you notice that there is something wrong with Flipper. [Root.GetSheHeCap] doesn't scurry around and play like [Root.GetSheHe] used to, [Root.GetSheHe] just lies down and moans pitifully, peering at you with [Root.GetHerHis] little beady eyes. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is obviously sick and starving.
translation: 最近，你注意到跳跳有什么不对劲。[Root.GetSheHeCap]不像[Root.GetSheHe]以往那样上蹿下跳了，[Root.GetSheHe]躺在地上无助地呻吟着，用[Root.GetHerHis]小眼睛注视着你。[Root.GetSheHeCap]显然饥病交加。

original: Recently, you notice that there is something wrong with Cuddles. [Root.GetSheHeCap] doesn't scurry around and play like [Root.GetSheHe] used to, [Root.GetSheHe] just lies down and moans pitifully, peering at you with [Root.GetHerHis] little beady eyes. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is obviously sick and starving.
translation: 最近，你注意到抱抱有什么不对劲。[Root.GetSheHeCap]不像[Root.GetSheHe]以往那样上蹿下跳了，[Root.GetSheHe]躺在地上无助地呻吟着，用[Root.GetHerHis]小眼睛注视着你。[Root.GetSheHeCap]显然饥病交加。

original: Recently, you notice that there is something wrong with Smelly. [Root.GetSheHeCap] doesn't scurry around and play like [Root.GetSheHe] used to, [Root.GetSheHe] just lies down and moans pitifully, peering at you with [Root.GetHerHis] little beady eyes. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is obviously sick and starving.
translation: 最近，你注意到臭臭有什么不对劲。[Root.GetSheHeCap]不像[Root.GetSheHe]以往那样上蹿下跳了，[Root.GetSheHe]躺在地上无助地呻吟着，用[Root.GetHerHis]小眼睛注视着你。[Root.GetSheHeCap]显然饥病交加。

original: I'll share my food with [Root.GetHerHim].
There's not enough.
Flipper dies!
Cuddles dies!
Smelly dies!

As the guards release you from the dungeon, you take one last look back. You see Flipper staring at you intently for a moment, [Root.GetHerHis] little eyes shining strangely in the half-darkness. Then [Root.GetSheHe] scurries away into a corner and out of sight.
translation: 当守卫将你从地牢放出来时，你回过头望了最后一眼。你发现跳跳正注视着你，阴影中[Root.GetHerHis]小眼睛奇怪地闪耀着。随后[Root.GetSheHe]便溜进角落消失了。

original: As the guards release you from the dungeon, you take one last look back. You see Cuddles staring at you intently for a moment, [Root.GetHerHis] little eyes shining strangely in the half-darkness. Then [Root.GetSheHe] scurries away into a corner and out of sight.
translation: 当守卫将你从地牢放出来时，你回过头望了最后一眼。你发现抱抱正注视着你，阴影中[Root.GetHerHis]小眼睛奇怪地闪耀着。随后[Root.GetSheHe]便溜进角落消失了。

original: As the guards release you from the dungeon, you take one last look back. You see Smelly staring at you intently for a moment, [Root.GetHerHis] little eyes shining strangely in the half-darkness. Then [Root.GetSheHe] scurries away into a corner and out of sight.
translation: 当守卫将你从地牢放出来时，你回过头望了最后一眼。你发现臭臭正注视着你，阴影中[Root.GetHerHis]小眼睛奇怪地闪耀着。随后[Root.GetSheHe]便溜进角落消失了。

original: I'll never forget you, Flipper!
I'll never forget you, Cuddles!
I'll never forget you, Smelly!

Languishing in my dungeon, one night I suddenly wake up with a cold feeling of apprehension. As I stare into the darkness, a hissing, evil voice speaks to me: 'I am the Dread King of Darkness. This dungeon is my realm, and I demand that you serve me.'.
translation: 我被囚禁在这地牢之中，某天晚上我突然被一阵恶寒惊醒。我向黑暗中望去，耳边传来一个沙哑而邪恶的声音：「吾乃邪忌之王。此狱为吾之所有，而汝将臣服。」

original: Yes, I will serve you!
Never!

Late one night, the Dread King of Darkness appears to me again: 'Servant! You must find me the three dark stones of sorcery. They have been stolen from me and hidden in this dungeon. Know that I do not abide failure!'
translation: 之后的一晚，邪忌之王再度现身并说道：「吾之仆从！汝必将为吾寻回三枚黑魔之石。吾之至宝为人所盗，匿于此狱。谨记，不容半点差池。」

original: I will use force to find them!
I shall use my cunning!
Eventually, I managed to recover the three dark stones of sorcery for the Dread King of Darkness. They only look like three ordinary little stones, but surely the King will be pleased.
translation: 最终，我成功地为邪忌之王找回了那三块黑魔石。它们看上去只是三块寻常的小石子，但无疑王会感到高兴的。

original: I am a hero, his most valuable servant!
translation: 我是一个英雄，邪忌之王最得力的仆人！

original: I never managed to recover the three dark stones of sorcery. I now fear that the Dread King of Darkness will come and punish me for my failure.
translation: 我没能成功地为邪忌之王找回那三块黑魔石。现在我害怕王会因我的失败而前来处罚我。

original: If I hide in the corner maybe he won't find me.
translation: 也许我躲在角落里就不会被他找到。

original: My war with the Dread King of Darkness has begun. Every night he sends his legions of ghosts and shadows to assault me.
translation: 我与邪忌之王之间的战争就此展开。每晚他都会派出他的幽灵大军来袭击我。

original: I must strike back with all my power!
I must evade, dodge and use my cunning!
translation: 我必须闪避并用上我的诡计！

original: In my valiant nightly battles against the Dread King of Darkness, I have finally reached the tipping point and forced my enemy to his knees.
translation: 这场对抗邪忌之王的英勇战斗终于迎来了转折点，我成功地使敌人屈服了。

original: I rule in this dungeon!
I am exhausted from my nightly battles with the Dread King of Darkness, yet he is steadily advancing against me. It seems that the time for surrender has come.
translation: 在这场与抗邪忌之王的战斗中我精疲力尽，然而他却能不停地向我发起进攻。看起来是时候投降了。

original: I should never have challenged him!
Submits to the Dread King of Darkness.
Fights the Dread King of Darkness.
Dark Stones of Sorcery
This character has imagined strange and fantastic adventures in the dungeons, finding the Dark Stones of Sorcery.
translation: 此人幻想了一段在地牢中寻找黑魔石的奇妙冒险。

original: Defeated the Dread King of Darkness
This character has imagined strange and fantastic adventures in the dungeons, defeating the Dread King of Darkness.
translation: 此人幻想了一段在地牢中击败邪忌之王的奇妙冒险。

Apply intrigue skill.

original: By calling in a §YFavor§! you can ask your liege to §Ydeclare war§! and press your claims.
translation: 通过兑现一个§Y人情§!，你可以要求你的君主§Y宣战§!并公开你的宣称。

original: This calls in a §YFavor§! to ask your liege to §Ydeclare war§! and press your claims.
translation: 这兑现了一个§Y人情§!用来要求你的君主§Y宣战§!并公开你的宣称。

original: I request that you repay the favor you owe me by declaring $CB$ against $RECIPIENT$. If you decline my rightful request, I will make sure the council hears of it.
translation: 我要求你针对$RECIPIENT$宣布$CB$来偿还你欠我的人情。如果你拒绝我正当的要求，我确保内阁将知道这件事。

Your Army Levies can be raised from your Demesne holdings and your direct vassals.\nYou pay maintenance for levies from your own holdings, but your vassals will pay for the levies they provide to you (which makes them unhappy).
translation: 你能够从你的领地和直属封臣那里征兵。\n你需要为你的征召兵支付维护费用，但你的封臣将会为他们提供给你的征召兵支付维护费用（这会令他们不高兴）。

original: §YRuler Present§!\nYou are currently marching with this Army, bravely risking your own life.
translation: §Y统治者亲征§!\n你现在正和军队一起行军，勇敢地冒着自己的生命危险。

original: Is a major vassal and expects to be on §YThe Council§!
translation: 是一个主要的封臣而且希望进入§Y内阁§!

original: Request that [Recipient.GetBestName] will vote like you on the Council. In exchange you will owe [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a Favor.
translation: 要求[Recipient.GetBestName]在内阁中和你投票一致。作为交换你欠[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]一个人情。

original: During a §YRegency§! the council votes on all issues, even those normally outside their purview.
translation: 在§Y摄政§!期间，内阁投票表决所有事务，甚至那些通常在他们权限之外的事务。

original: \nRealm Peace is enforced in the realm
Realm Peace is not being enforced in the realm
translation: 没有在国家内部执行全境和平

original: §YLiege enforcing Realm Peace!§!

The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall reign in all the realm! 
All internal wars waged between vassals of $LIEGE|Y$ will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $MONTHS|Y$ months!

If you are on the Council you can call in a §YFavor§! from $LIEGE|Y$ to prevent the §YRealm Peace§! from being enforced.
translation:
$LIEGE|Y$的内阁已经宣布和平应统治全境！
所有$LIEGE|Y$的封臣之间发动的内部战争将以§Y无条件和平§!在 $MONTHS|Y$ 个月后结束。

如果你在内阁里，你能够兑现一个$LIEGE|Y$的§Y人情§!来阻止§Y全境和平§!被执行。

original: §YLiege has Enforced Realm Peace!§!
The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall reign in all the realm! \nVassals of $LIEGE|Y$ are unable to wage war on each other for another $MONTHS|Y$ months!
translation: $LIEGE|Y$的内阁已经宣布全境和平。\n$LIEGE|Y$的封臣在 $MONTHS|Y$ 个月内不能彼此发动战争。

original: Realm Peace
$LIEGE|Y$ has notified his vassal $VASSAL|Y$ about the decision to enforce peace.
translation: $LIEGE|Y$已经通知他的封臣$VASSAL|Y$关于强制和平的决定。

original: \nWith the support of my Council I decree that there shall be Peace in all my realm. You have three months to end your conflicts.
translation: \n在我的内阁的支持下，我将颁布全境和平的法令。你有三个月的时间解决你的争端。

original: Realm Peace
$RECIPIENT|Y$ must owe $ACTOR|Y$ a favor
Prevent Realm Peace
By calling in a §YFavor§!, you can prevent your liege from enforcing §YRealm Peace§! this time. Your liege will be prevented from using the §YCouncil§! to invoke §YRealm Peace§! again for two years.
translation: 通过兑现一个§Y人情§!，你能阻止你的君主执行§Y全境和平§!。你的君主在两年内不能再次使用§Y内阁§!来提出§Y全境和平§!。

original: This spends a §YFavor§! to stop §YRealm Peace§! from being enforced. Your liege can not attempt to enforce §YRealm Peace§! for two years after this.
translation: 阻止§Y全境和平§!花费了一个§Y人情§!。你的君主无法在此后两年内试图再次执行§Y全境和平§!

original: My liege, I want to remind you that you owe me a favor, and your decree of peace in the realm goes against my interests...
translation: 我的领主，我想提醒您欠我一个人情，您颁布的全境和平法令与我的利益有冲突……

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! called in a §YFavor§! from §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to stop §YRealm Peace§! from being enforced.
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!兑现了一个§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!的§Y人情§!，用来阻止§Y全境和平§!的执行。

Peace is not already being enforced.

Ruler of $REALM|Y$
Increases the payment factor for $TITLE$ by $VALUE1|%$ to $VALUE2$%.
The payment factor for $TITLE$ is set to $VALUE$%.
§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! brings together a band of soldiers and starts to look for employment.
translation: §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!集合了一队士兵然后开始寻找雇主。

original:
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
My men and I have had trouble finding a battlefield where our expertise could be employed for payment in gold, and unfortunately our rations are now running low. I therefore request additional funding to keep the men from starving.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]，
我和我的人现在无法找到一个肯雇佣我们的战场来体现我们的专业能力以获取黄金，更加不幸的是我们的口粮快要吃完了。所以我需要另外的投资来避免我的人饿死。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I'll cover the cost for extra rations.
translation: 我将支付额外的口粮的费用。

original: Starvation might serve as a lesson to [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 对[From.GetHerHim]而言饥饿可能是一个教训。

original:
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
The money you sent was well needed. However we had to spend the whole lot of it on food. We could need some better equipment to have better chances of success once we reach the battlefield. Equipment is rather expensive for our empty purse and I know that you will see the benefit of such an investment.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]，
你送来的钱是及时雨。但是我们不得不把全部的钱都花在食物上。而一旦我们到达战场，我们可能需要一些更好的装备才有更好的成功机会。装备是相当昂贵的，而我们钱包空空，我知道你会看到这样的投资的好处。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I'll send a contribution at once.
I can't spare you a single coin.
Remind [From.GetFirstName] of [From.GetHerHis] obligations.

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
War is a harsh business and the soldiers are demanding more money. I have no regrets informing you that this money will come from your cut, since it's the people fighting that are doing all the work and not the people sitting on high chairs.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]，
战争是残酷的，士兵们正要求更多的金钱。我毫无遗憾地通知你这笔钱会来自你的开销，因为是浴血战斗的人做了一切而不是那些坐在高位上的人。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Of course the men should be rewarded generously.
translation: 这些人当然应该获得慷慨的回报。

original: Let them keep a little of the money.
I need to remind [From.GetName] that this would be a breach of contract.
translation: 我需要提醒[From.GetName]，这将违反合约。

original: The payment factor for $TITLE$ is higher than $VALUE|%$.
The payment factor for $TITLE$ is lower than $VALUE|%$.

Noble Obligation Laws
Heavily Tax Focused Noble Obligations
This law governs how much tax and levies the gentry in the realm are obliged to contribute. The gentry tend to favor paying taxes over making troops available for their liege.
translation: 这个法律规定王国内的贵族们必须上贡多少的税和兵员。贵族们倾向于缴税而胜于提供军队给国王。
