original: Execution
The Council's ability to influence executions.
Ruler Execution Sovereignty
The Ruler has full authority on Executions.\n
translation: 君主拥有处决的绝对权力。\n

original: Ruler
Execution Committee
Council members vote on Executions.\n
translation: 内阁成员投票决定是否执行死刑。\n

original: Council
[Prev.Capital.County.GetAdjective] Band
§Y$VASSAL$§! has rejected the proposed §Y$LAW$§! Law in §Y$TITLE$§!
Vassal Rejects a Law

Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and give the [Root.GetCouncilName] more powers in deciding the policies of the realm. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并给予[Root.GetCouncilName]更大的立法权。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Under pressure from a powerful Faction, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has agreed to increase the power of the [Root.GetCouncilName].
translation: 在强大派系的压力之下，§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!同意扩大[Root.GetCouncilName]的权力。

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to give the [Root.GetCouncilName] more powers in deciding the policies of the realm. Your valuable support in this matter will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[From.GetTitledName]已经同意给予[Root.GetCouncilName]更大的立法权。你在此事中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Demand Increased Council Power
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding increased power for the Council. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求增加内阁的权力。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝遵从，你的派系会起兵反抗。

original: Increased Council Power
Increased Council Power in [This.GetName]

Members seek to increase the amount of decisions made by the council rather than decreed by the ruler alone. Once this faction is sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 派系成员们增加内阁能够制定的法令，而不是君主独断专行。当派系积蓄了足够的力量，§Y[From.GetBestName]§!将会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒。

original: Increased Council Power
Decreased Council Power
Likes New Obligation Law
Dislikes New Obligation Law
Free Inheritance
Vassal titles do not have any special regulations on inheritance outside the realm.
translation: 对封臣头衔由外国继承没有任何特殊规定。

original: Free
Regulated Inheritance
Vassal title inheritance is regulated to disallow a title to pass to another realm.
translation: 不允许外国人继承封臣头衔

original: Illegal
Passing the controlled realm inheritance law will protect titles within the realm from being inherited by characters loyal to another liege.
translation: 制定控制领地继承的法令，可以确保头衔不被忠于另一位君主的人继承。

original: Controlled Realm Inheritance
Status of Women

Medieval societies usually function under a patriarchal social structure where women are kept from positions of power and influence. A ruler can alter this state of affairs by issuing decrees that give women increased access to higher positions in society.
translation: 中世纪社会通常在父权制社会结构下运行，而女性被排除在有权力和影响力的职位之外。君主可以改变这一状况，颁布法令，赋予女性担任更高级职位的权利。

original: Traditional Status of Women
Women are prohibited from holding all job positions. Some government types will be restricted to Agnatic inheritance laws.
translation: 女性被禁止担任任何职位。一些政体将会限定继承人为男性。

original: Tradition
Marginal Status of Women
Women are allowed to hold some power, occupying background positions behind the people in charge.
translation: 女性被允许掌握一定的权力，身居幕后辅佐主事者。

original: Marginal
Significant Status of Women
Women have been granted official power and are allowed to hold public offices.
translation: 女性被正式授予政治权力，被允许担任公职。

original: Significant
Notable Status of Women
Restrictions on female power have been officially repealed. All career paths are open for prominent women.
translation: 对女性的限制被正式废止。所有的职位为杰出的女性敞开大门。

original: Notable
Full Status of Women
Powerful legislation removing old restrictions has finally had the effect of affecting the general opinion on women in positions of power across society.
translation: 通过强有力的立法，大众对女性社会地位的偏见最终得以消除。

original: Full
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
translation: 与统治者有关系的女性，被允许担任[Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n

original: Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
translation: 与统治者有关系的女性，被允许担任[Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n

original: Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
translation: 与统治者有关系的女性，被允许担任[Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n

original: Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
Women related to the ruler are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
translation: 与统治者有关系的女性，被允许担任[Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n

original: Women are no longer allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
I've gotten an increased amount of questions from [target_child.GetFirstName] lately about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and the rituals of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: [target_child.GetFirstName]最近越来越多地向我询问有关[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]和[Root.Religion.GetName]仪式的问题。

original: Time to teach [target_child.GetHerHim] about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
It will be better for [target_child.GetHerHim] not to know.

Over the past weeks I've grown more and more curious about the beliefs and rituals of my [GetFromRelation]. Today [From.GetSheHe] finally began to answer my repeated questions about [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 在过去的几个星期中，我越来越好奇我[GetFromRelation]的信仰，今天[From.GetSheHe]终于回答了我一直追问他的有关[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]的问题。

original: Glory to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
What repugnant ideas!
Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName] has, through the teachings of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], been studying the principles of the [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] faith
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetFirstName]已经在通过[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的教诲学习[FromFrom.Religion.GetName]信仰的原则了。

original: Interesting.

During the past few months, [target_child.GetFirstName] has shown dogged determination in [target_child.GetHerHis] studies of our language and has now also expressed a desire to study the history of my people's ancestors.
translation: 近几个月以来，[extortion_target.GetFirstName]对于学习我们的语言表现出了顽强的决心，如今也表示想了解我们民族祖先的历史。

original: I should encourage it.
translation: 我应该鼓励他继续下去

original: Make sure [target_child.GetSheHe] learns about [target_child.GetHerHis] own customs.
Pleased with the progress I'm making with learning the local language, [From.GetFirstName] has brought me a book about the ancestry of the [From.Culture.GetName] people.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]因为我学习当地的语言而满意，并为我买了一本关于[From.Culture.GetName]血统的书。

original: How fascinating.
I'd rather study my own family's heritage.
translation: 我宁愿学习我自己家庭的传统。

original: Rumor has it that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been influenced by [From.GetHerHis] guardian's splendor. It is said that [From.GetFirstName] is now considered properly [From.Culture.GetName].
translation: 据说你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]已受到[From.GetHerHis]监护人感化。据说[From.GetFirstName]现在可以被视为真正的[From.Culture.GetName]人。

original: I hope it's a beneficial influence.
translation: 希望那是一个有益的影响。

original:
To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],

I write to ask for your permission to give my ward, [From.GetFirstName], a proper [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] upbringing.

Signed [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
translation:
致[GetFromFromRootCompliment][Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]，

我写信给你，是希望我能以[FromFrom.Religion.GetName][FromFrom.Culture.GetName]的方式教育[From.GetFirstName]。

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: That seems appropriate.
I will never allow [From.GetHerHim] to turn into a savage!
translation: 我不会允许[From.GetHerHim]变成一个野蛮人。

original: Dear, [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName].\n\nWhile I admire your enthusiasm for the upbringing of [FromFrom.GetFirstName] I do believe that it's best to continue with the current plan of education for [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
translation: 亲爱的，[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]。\n\n尽管我赞赏你养育[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的热情，我仍相信最好为[FromFrom.GetHerHim]沿用现行教育方案。

original: Not the response I had hoped for.
What a rude response!
Ask Permission for Heritage Focus
I've been having these special feelings for a special someone lately. The strange urges to find myself embraced and close to another person. If I could only find myself alone with...
translation: 最近我对一个特别的人产生了特别的感觉。这奇怪的冲动迫使我去接近，拥抱那个人。当我独处时，我会愿意和……

original: ...the Farrier's apprentice.
...the Carpenter's daughter.
...the Carpenter's daughter.
...the Farrier's apprentice.
...no, I had better keep these thoughts for myself.
...no, these feelings are wrong!
After weeks of waiting for the right opportunity I find myself behind the barn alone with the Farrier's apprentice that my heart has been longing for. My palms are sweaty and my chest is pounding.
translation: 几周之后，我终于等到了时机。我和马夫的学徒在谷仓后独处，那个我心仪已久的人。我的手开始出汗，心脏狂跳不已。

original: After weeks of waiting for the right opportunity I find myself behind the barn alone together with the Carpenter's daughter that my heart has been longing for. My palms are sweaty and my chest is pounding.
translation: 几周之后，我终于等到了时机。我和木匠的女儿在谷仓后独处，那个我心仪已久的人。我的手开始出汗，心脏狂跳不已。

original: Declare my eternal love for her.
Declare my eternal love for him.
Kiss her on the cheek.
Kiss him on the cheek.
Suggest a secluded cuddle inside the barn.
translation: 提议在僻静无人的谷仓中彼此相拥。

original: Suggest a secluded cuddle inside the barn.
translation: 提议在僻静无人的谷仓中彼此相拥。

original: Revoke Title
Laws governing the right of a ruler to revoke titles from its subjects.
translation: 法律限制统治者剥夺臣属头衔。

original: Title Revocation Disallowed
The ruler is not under any circumstances allowed to interfere in the ownership of hereditary titles.
translation: 君主在任何情况下都不得干涉世袭头衔的所有权。

original: None
Title Revocation Allowed
The ruler is allowed to legally seize hereditary titles from traitors and unlawful subjects.
translation: 君主可以合法地夺取叛徒和不法臣民的世袭头衔。

original: Allowed
Religious Control Mandate
The ruler has acquired the right to enforce religious control upon subjects and may now seize the titles of heathens and heretics freely.
translation: 君主得到授权用以控制臣民的宗教信仰，现在可以随意剥夺异教徒和异端的头衔。

original: Religious
Administration
These laws govern how society controls and organizes ownership of property and wealth.
translation: 这些法律规定社会如何管理和规划财富与资产的所有权。

original: Late Feudal Administration

Late feudal lords realize the importance of keeping the inheritance together to facilitate their dynasty's long-term increase in power and wealth. In this system, there is a tendency for vassals to grow more and more powerful with time if not kept in check.
translation: 后期封建领主意识到保持遗产整体继承的重要性，这会促进他们王朝权力和财富的长期增长。在这个体制下如果不进行制约的话，随着时间的推移封臣们会变得越来越强大。

original: Late
There are other wars that are more important for me right now.\n
translation: 目前别的战争对我而言更重要。\n

original: The Advisor is a respected member of the realm's council and is responsible for giving sound advice on any matters that the ruler has to deal with.
translation: 这位顾问是内阁中被广为敬重的一位。在君主需要时，他有义务在为君主提供合理建议。

original: The Advisor is a respected member of the realm's council and is responsible for giving sound advice on any matters that the ruler has to deal with.
translation: 这位顾问是内阁中被广为敬重的一位。在君主需要时，他有义务为君主提供合理建议。

original: §YAllies joining on your side.§!
§YAllies joining on the enemy's side.§!
§Y$NAME$'s Relations§!
Friends, Rivals, Marriage Ties and Lovers
Enforce Realm Peace

Your mercenary band captain [From.GetTitledName] has shown much interest in your [chosen_child.GetSonDaughter] [chosen_child.GetFirstName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] approaches you with a marriage proposal. Any children in such a marriage would be of [From.GetTitledName]'s dynasty.
translation: 你雇佣兵团的团长[From.GetTitledName]对你的[chosen_child.GetSonDaughter][chosen_child.GetFirstName]非常感兴趣。现在[From.GetSheHe]当面提出了婚姻请求。此婚姻中的任何子女都将属于[From.GetTitledName]的家族。

original: Not a bad idea.
Outrageous!
All port counties experience tax collecting issues\n
translation: 港口区域遭遇税收问题\n

original: [From.GetFirstName] should stay out of my business.
[From.GetTitledName] seemed very grateful for my help, and promised to return the favor whenever possible.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]似乎非常感激我的帮助，并承诺尽可能的回报我。

original: I'm glad it worked out for them.
translation: 我很高兴他们做出的决定。

original: [From.GetTitledName] was upset that I interrupted a private discussion, [From.GetSheHe] wanted me to stay out of their business in the future.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]由于我打断了一次私人会谈而不愉快。[From.GetSheHe]要我将来远离他们的事务。

original: [From.GetTitledName] should be grateful for my help!

[From.GetFullName] proposes that we send more troops making them a bigger, better mercenary band. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that with the experience [From.GetSheHe] has gained, trusting [From.GetHerHim] with a greater force is a natural way of showing mutual respect and trust.
translation: [From.GetFullName]提议让我们送出更多军队使他们成为更强大优秀的雇佣兵团。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持认为，凭借[From.GetSheHe]已有的经验，托付给[From.GetHerHim]强大的力量是展现相互尊重和信任的自然方式。

original: Accept proposal.
Respectfully disagree.
[From.GetFullName] was not happy with your decision to dissolve '[From.GetHerHis]' mercenary band. [From.GetSheHeCap] is reported to have taken your soldiers as [From.GetHerHis] own and disappeared.
translation: [From.GetFullName]不满意你决定解散[From.GetHerHis]雇佣兵团。[From.GetSheHeCap]被报称将你的士兵作为[From.GetHerHis]所有物消失了。

original: When I find [From.GetHerHim]...
Who knows what they will be up to.
translation: 谁知道他们会面对什么。

original: This will put an end to the Mercenary Company. Your current Mercenary Captain may not like this.
translation: 这将会结束这个佣兵团的历史。你现任的佣兵团长可不喜欢这样。

original: Council Power
Empowers and abolishes the Council.
Absolute Rule
Empowered Council
The ruler has full authority over politics and laws.\n
translation: 君主在政治和法律上有绝对的权力。\n

original: This empowers the Council.\n
Abolish
Empower
Banishment
The Council's ability to influence banishment of characters from the realm.
Ruler Banishment Sovereignty
Banishment Committee
The ruler has full authority on Banishments.\n
translation: 君主拥有驱逐囚犯的绝对权力。\n

original: Council members vote on Banishments.\n
translation: 内阁成员投票决定是否执行驱逐。\n

original: Ruler
Council
Revoke Titles
The Council's ability to influence Title Revocation.
translation: 内阁可否干涉头衔收回。

original: Ruler Title Revocation Sovereignty
Title Revocation Committee
The ruler has full authority on Title Revocation issues.\n
translation: 君主拥有剥夺头衔的绝对权力。\n

original: Council members vote on Title Revocation issues.\n
translation: 内阁成员投票决定头衔剥夺与否。\n

original: Ruler
Council
Grant Titles
The Council's ability to influence Title Grant decisions.
translation: 内阁可否干涉头衔赐予。

original: Ruler Title Grant Sovereignty
Title Grant Committee
The ruler has full authority on Title Grants.\n
translation: 君主拥有授予头衔的绝对权力。\n

original: Council members vote on Title Grants.\n
translation: 内阁成员投票决定头衔授予与否。\n

original: Ruler
Council
Imprisonment
The Council's ability to influence Imprisonment decisions.
Ruler Imprisonment Sovereignty
Imprisonment Committee
The Ruler has full authority on Imprisonment issues.\n
translation: 君主拥有逮捕的绝对权力。\n

original: Council members vote on imprisonment issues.\n
translation: 内阁成员投票决定逮捕与否。

original: Ruler
Council
War Declaration
The Council's ability to influence Declarations of War.
Ruler War Declaration Sovereignty
War Declaration Committee
The Ruler has full authority on War Declarations.\n
translation: 君主拥有对外宣战的绝对权力。

original: Council members vote on War Declarations.\n
translation: 内阁成员投票决定宣战与否。

original: Ruler
Council
Lowered Tribal Organization
I am speaking in tongues and screaming obscenities at random times, people believe me to be possessed.
translation: 我说着胡言乱语并且不时地尖声喊出猥亵的话语，人们相信我被恶魔附身了。

original: [moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetChancellorName].
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetMarshalName].
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetTreasurerName].
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetSpymasterName].
[moving_councillor.GetSheHeCap] should be my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName].
I've changed my mind.
Today [curious_events_char_1.GetFullName] said [curious_events_char_1.GetSheHe] had to attend to various important matters, and I would have to spend the day alone.
translation: 今天[curious_events_char_1.GetFullName]说[curious_events_char_1.GetSheHe]不得不参加各种重要的事务，所以我得独自度过这一天。

original: I woke up early and found a sealed letter addressed to [curious_events_char_2.GetTitledName]. I wonder what it could say?
translation: 我醒来得很早，我发现了一封写给[curious_events_char_2.GetTitledName]的信。我很想知道里面会写些什么呢？

original: Suddenly I hear something moving around in the bushes next to me. I ask who's there but there's no response.
translation: 突然，我听见有东西从灌木丛里朝我移动。我问是谁在那却没有回应。

original: I will follow [curious_events_char_1.GetHerHim] to see what [curious_events_char_1.GetSheHe] is up to!
translation: 我要跟着[curious_events_char_1.GetHerHim]来看看[curious_events_char_1.GetSheHe]到底在打什么算盘！

original: I can play all day!
Place it on the table and ask about it later.
translation: 把它放在桌子上，之后好好问问。

original: I should find out. It could be important.
translation: 我应该查清楚。这说不定很重要。

original: I should investigate.
I should tell someone.
I had told [From.GetFirstName] to stay at home, but just as I finish purchasing my gift to [From.GetHerHim] I turn around and see [From.GetHerHim] trying to hide from me. The surprise is ruined.
translation: 我告诉过[From.GetFirstName]待在家里，但正当我买好给[From.GetHerHim]的礼物转过身时却发现[From.GetHerHim]正尝试躲藏起来。我的惊喜毁了。

original: I come back after a day out fetching some things at the market and see [From.GetFirstName] patiently waiting for me like I asked.
translation: 当我辛苦了一天，从市场买完东西回来后看见[From.GetFirstName]就像当时我要求过的那样很耐心地等着我。

original: I could hear someone sneaking around inside and believed it to be a burglar. When I went downstairs I discovered [From.GetFirstName] opening one of my letters.
translation: 我听见有人在附近鬼鬼祟祟，我以为是个窃贼。当我走下楼梯的时候却我发现[From.GetFirstName]正在打开我的信件。

original: I had expected some letters today but couldn't find any. I was suspicious at first but when I asked [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] pointed to a table where they were already sorted for me, untouched.
translation: 我原以为今天会有些信件，但是我并没有收到一封。我原本心存怀疑，但是当我问[From.GetFirstName]的时候，[From.GetSheHe]指向一个桌子上为我整理好的未开封信件。

original: I'll grab [From.GetHerHim] by the ear and have a serious talk.
translation: 我会揪着[From.GetHerHim]的耳朵好好地谈谈。

original: I can't blame [From.GetHerHim].
I should give [From.GetHerHim] some treats.
I'll teach [From.GetHerHim] to be less nosy.
[From.GetSheHeCap] could use some practice reading.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is a joy to have around.

[From.GetTitledName] was buying things at the market and [From.GetSheHe] saw me there. Then [From.GetSheHe] pinched my ear and said I should do what I am told. [From.GetSheHeCap] was getting me a treats at the market but now I won't get any!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]正在市场买东西然后[From.GetSheHe]看见了我。[From.GetSheHe]揪着我的耳朵说我应该按被吩咐的那么做。[From.GetSheHeCap]本来想要犒劳我，但现在我什么都得不到了！

original: I followed [From.GetTitledName] to the market, but then [From.GetSheHe] caught me. [From.GetSheHeCap] laughed and said I was hopeless.
translation: 我跟着[From.GetTitledName]去了市场，但之后[From.GetSheHe]抓到了我。[From.GetSheHeCap]笑了笑，说我真是没救。

original: [From.GetTitledName] saw me opening the letter and grabbed me by the hand. Then he cut my finger with the paper and said I should keep my nose out of others business.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]看见我正在打开信封并且抓住了我。之后他用纸切我的手指说我不应该打探别人的事儿。

original: [From.GetTitledName] came downstairs just as I was opening the letter but [From.GetSheHe] wasn't angry with me. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me it is considered rude to go through other people's belongings.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]在我正要打开信封的时候走下台阶，但是[From.GetSheHe]并没有对我发火。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我染指他人的财物是很不礼貌的事情。

original: It was a big disgusting rat. It hissed and bit me in the hand and now it hurts, a lot!
translation: 那是个恶心的大老鼠。它嘶嘶地叫着还咬了我的手，咬得非常疼！

original: I found an injured bird, it seems to have fallen from its nest. Maybe I can keep it as a pet while it recovers.
translation: 我发现一只受伤的鸟，它看起来是从它的巢里摔了下来。也许我可以养着它直到它痊愈。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is hiding something.
I should apologize.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is so much fun!
That was a secret letter!
It wasn't mine to read.
It's probably a boring letter anyway.
translation: 也许这只不过是封无聊的信件。

original: I'm glad I found out!
I was meant to learn.
What a great day.
[From.GetFirstName] didn't react well to my way of correcting [From.GetHerHis] behavior. I fear [From.GetSheHe] is even more suspicious towards me now.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]并没有很好地回应我纠正[From.GetHerHis]行为，我担心[From.GetSheHe]甚至更怀疑我了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] Seems regretful that [From.GetSheHe] disobeyed me. Hopefully It won't happen again.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]看起来很后悔[From.GetSheHe]没有遵守我的吩咐。希望这不会再发生了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seems even more interested in the letter now that [From.GetSheHe] knows it's forbidden.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]似乎对于那封信更加感兴趣了，毕竟现在[From.GetSheHe]知道那是禁止事项。

original: After talking to [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] seems to understand the concept of privacy better.
translation: 在和[From.GetFirstName]谈过之后[From.GetSheHe]看起来更好地理解了隐私概念。

original: Worrying.
There is hope for the child.
Maybe I should have dealt with it differently.
translation: 也许我也该用其他方式来处理这事儿。

original: A step in the right direction.
translation: 正确方向上的一个进步。

original: Find something nasty.
Find a friend.
I saw that the private chambers of [conscientious_events_char_1.GetFullName] were very messy. Papers, books and things lying around everywhere!
translation: 我看见[conscientious_events_char_1.GetFullName]的私房十分杂乱。纸张、书籍还有乱七八糟的东西散落在房间每个角落！

original: After supper, me and [conscientious_events_char_2.GetFirstName] were supposed to help do the dishes. But [conscientious_events_char_2.GetFirstName] hid the dirty dishes and wants to go play instead.
translation: 晚餐之后，我和[conscientious_events_char_2.GetFirstName]本应去清洗餐具。但是[conscientious_events_char_2.GetFirstName]却把脏餐具收起来打算出去玩。

original: It's getting late but I lost my new vest when I was playing somewhere. If i come back without it everyone will think I'm sloppy!
translation: 时间越来越晚了，但是我在外面玩的时候搞丢了我的新背心。如果我就这样回去所有人都会觉得我很不正经！

original: I will sort it out for [conscientious_events_char_1.GetHerHim].
So much to do outside.
translation: 在外面有很多事情该去做。

original: I have to tell on [conscientious_events_char_2.GetHerHim].
No one will find out!
I have to go look for it.
I can explain when I get back.
translation: 我可以在我回去后解释清楚。

original: Becoming ill
Successful find

As I enter my chambers, all of the work I had done in my spare time seems to have been cleaned up and put back. Books are neatly set in alphabetical order and notes have been thrown away. [From.GetFullName] was apparently 'cleaning' earlier.
translation: 当我走进我的房间时，我闲余时间所做的所有工作看起来都被清理和摆回原位。书籍被按照字母顺序整齐排列而笔记都被扔掉。[From.GetFullName]明显「打扫」过了我的房间。

original: After supper, me and [From.GetFirstName] were forced to do dishes. But I was clever and hid them, until [From.GetFirstName] told on me and now I have to do all of it.
translation: 晚餐之后，我和[From.GetFirstName]被强迫去清洗餐具。但是我很聪明地把餐具藏了起来，直到[From.GetFirstName]告发了我而现在我不得不清洗全部。

original: After supper, me and [From.GetFirstName] had to clean up. But we hid all the dishes where no one could see and now we have been playing all evening.
translation: 晚餐之后，我和[From.GetFirstName]要去清洗餐具。但是我们把所有的餐具藏到了谁都找不到的地方，现在我们可以玩一整个晚上了。

original: I'll mess up [From.GetHerHis] chambers.
Cleaning is not my virtue...
Unfair! I'll run away.
Stupid dishes.
We had so much fun together.

[From.GetTitledName] didn't like that I was cleaning [From.GetHerHis] chambers, [From.GetSheHe] could not find important books. Now [From.GetSheHe] messed mine up and said I wasn't allowed back in [From.GetHersHis] anymore.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]并不喜欢我打扫[From.GetHerHis]房间，[From.GetSheHe]有一本重要的书籍找不到了。现在[From.GetSheHe]弄乱了我的而且说我再也不被允许去[From.GetHersHis]房间了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] ran away when I told on him. The others said I don't have to do all the work alone. But I was a good [Root.GetBoyGirl] for telling them.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]在我告发他的时候跑开了。其他人说我不需要自己做所有的活。但是我告诉他们我是个好[Root.GetBoyGirl]。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was angry with me, but we did finish all the work together. Maybe [From.GetSheHe] doesn't like me any more.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]对我很生气，虽然我们的确一块做完了所有的活。也许[From.GetSheHe]再也不会喜欢我了。

original: I was out too long in the evening, and it hurts when I breathe. The adults say I have to rest a lot.
translation: 我晚上在外面待得太久了，甫一呼吸就会感到疼痛。大人们说我要好好休息。

original: Yes! I found my vest and no one will even know it was missing.
translation: 赞！我找到了我的背心而且没人会知道这玩意儿丢过！

original: Now I have to clean again.
translation: 现在我得再打扫一遍了。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is a meanie and I will tell everyone!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]是个小气鬼，我要告诉所有人！

original: I will do it myself.
I can spend time reading.
translation: 我可以阅读来消磨时间。

original: The grownups are happy.
I feel terrible.
Next time I will take my things with me.
translation: 下次我会好好带着自己的东西。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is quietly cleaning [From.GetHerHis] chambers after my episode in there. Seems like this is a very thorough child.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]在经过我的插曲之后很安静地打扫着[From.GetHerHis]房间。看起来这家伙是个仔细的孩子。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was very upset with me and told everyone what I did.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]看我很不爽并且告诉了所有人我干了啥。

original: Maybe I shouldn't have.
translation: 也许当时我不该那么做。

original: That little monster.
It's bedtime but I can't find my favorite toy. I have it when I go to sleep.
translation: 已经是上床的时间了，但是我找不到我最爱的玩具。我每次睡觉都会抱着它。

original: Food is on my plate, but steam is coming out of it. I wonder if it's safe to eat? [fussy_events_char_2.GetTitledName] is looking at me.
translation: 食物摆在我的盘子上，但是蒸汽不停地冒出来。我想知道这玩意儿吃了真没事吗？[fussy_events_char_2.GetTitledName]正在看着我。

original: I was invited to the servants' quarters to eat cake with them tonight. But just as I was going there, it started raining.
translation: 我被仆人们邀请到他们的住处去和他们一块吃蛋糕。但是正当我要去那里的时候，开始下雨了。

original: I can't sleep without it!
translation: 我不能在没有它的情况下睡觉！

original: I'm a big [Root.GetBoyGirl] now.
It's too hot.
I should trust [fussy_events_char_2.GetFirstName].
I can make it if I run.
translation: 如果我跑起来我可以到那儿。

original: I don't want to get wet, I'll wait.
Make it with no effort
Out in the cold too long
[From.GetFirstName] says [From.GetHerHis] favorite toy is missing and [From.GetSheHe] won't go to bed without it. I may have thrown it out today when I was tidying up.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说[From.GetHerHis]最喜欢的玩具丢了而[From.GetSheHe]没那东西睡不着。我好像在收拾的时候不小心扔掉了那东西。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was a bit worried about not finding [From.GetHerHis] favorite toy, but seems to have settled down and is now sound asleep.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]本来有点担心找不到[From.GetHerHis]最喜欢的玩具，但看起来现在已经安定下来并且睡着了。

original: At the table today, [From.GetFirstName] complained about the food being too hot without even touching it.
translation: 今天[From.GetFirstName]在饭桌上抱怨了食物实在太烫。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was very happy at dinner today, eating with great appetite.
I'll offer to buy a new one.
Guess I have to go find it.
translation: 我猜我得找到那玩意儿。

original: One more step towards growing up.
Touch the food to make sure.
Let [From.GetHerHim] wait.
That's nice.
[From.GetFirstName] offered to get me a new toy. [From.GetSheHeCap] said we could go find something nice tomorrow.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]允许我买个新玩具。[From.GetSheHeCap]说我们明天可以一起去找个好点的来。

original: [From.GetFirstName] finally found my toy after looking for it everywhere. It was in the trash.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]翻遍所有角落终于找到了我的玩具。是在垃圾堆里翻到的。

original: [From.GetFirstName] reached over the table and touched my food with [From.GetHerHis] whole hand. [From.GetSheHeCap] said it was not too hot to eat.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]把身子伸过整个桌子然后用[From.GetHerHis]整个手碰了一下食物。[From.GetSheHeCap]说这并不是很烫。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seemed angry with me and told me to wait until I felt the food's temperature was just right. Now its cool enough.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]看起来很生气并告诉我等到我感觉食物的温度好点了再吃。现在食物凉透了。

original: I ran very fast and I made it in time. We had lots of fun and the servants seem to like me.
translation: 我跑得足够快所以我准时到达了。我们过得很开心并且仆人们看起来也很喜欢我。

original: I made it to the servants' quarters, but I got very wet. Then we had a good time and they felt sorry for me having to go out in the cold..
translation: 我到了仆人们的住处，但是我湿透了。之后我们度过了不错的时间，但他们对我外出着凉感到十分抱歉。

original: It's not the same, I want my toy!
translation: 这并不一样，我想要我自己的玩具！

original: Ok then.
It stinks!
Oh I thought I had lost it.
But now [From.GetSheHe] touched it.
I guess it's fine.
But now some of it is too cold.
translation: 但现在其中一些已经凉透了。

original: Alright, I'll eat the cold food.
Yum yum.
I don't feel so good.
My offer to purchase a new toy was rejected by [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is upset I would even suggest such a thing.
translation: 我买新玩具的提议被[From.GetFirstName]拒绝了。[From.GetSheHeCap]对我会有这样的建议非常不满。

original: [From.GetFirstName] agreed to go get a new toy the next day and finally settled down.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]愿意第二天去买个新玩具并且终于消停下来了。

original: I found the toy [From.GetFirstName] was crying about after going through the trash. But now [From.GetSheHe] is not satisfied because it smells.
translation: 我在垃圾堆中找到了[From.GetFirstName]不停哭闹想要的玩具。但是[From.GetSheHe]并不满意，因为它太臭了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] finally fell asleep after I found [From.GetHerHis] toy.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]在我找到[From.GetHerHis]玩具后终于睡下了。

original: No matter what I do or avoid doing, there seems to be no good way to make [From.GetFirstName] relax. [From.GetSheHeCap] won't eat at all now and I have no more energy to deal with it.
translation: 不论我做什么或不做什么，看起来没有一个好的方法能让[From.GetFirstName]缓和下来。[From.GetSheHeCap]什么都不想吃而我也没精力跟这事儿瞎闹腾了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] finally decided to eat [From.GetHerHis] food.
There is no pleasing this child.
What a relief.
It stinks!
Oh I thought I had lost it.
Hopeless.
Peace at last.
[idolizer_events_char_1.GetTitledName] is so kind to me. And [idolizer_events_char_1.GetSheHe] seems to know so much about everything.
translation: [idolizer_events_char_1.GetTitledName]对我真的很好。而且[idolizer_events_char_1.GetSheHe]好像什么都懂。

original: Spending time with [idolizer_events_char_2.GetFirstName] is great. We get along so well. Even when we do chores together time goes by so fast.
translation: 和[idolizer_events_char_2.GetFirstName]一起度过时间真的绝赞。我们处得很好。甚至一起忙于那些琐事的时候时间也是过得那么快。

original: I have been praying with the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] for a while and some of the other people in the temple are getting ready to leave.
translation: 我和[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]一起祷告了很久很久，神殿中的很多人已经打算离开了。

original: I'll write [idolizer_events_char_1.GetHerHim] a song!
I should tell the courtiers that I like it here.
translation: 我应该告诉我的廷臣们我喜欢这儿。

original: Everything is better when [idolizer_events_char_2.GetSheHe] is around.
translation: [idolizer_events_char_2.GetSheHe]在身边时每件事都变得顺心。

original: I will stay friends with [idolizer_events_char_2.GetHerHim] forever.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will notice my dedication.
I can collect alms to keep for myself.
translation: 我可以为自己收集并留下救济金。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has written a song in my honor. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] wants me to know that I'm the best person in the world.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]特地为我写了一首歌。显然[From.GetSheHe]想让我知道我是世界上最棒的人。

original: [From.GetFirstName] told me that everyone is so kind here. [From.GetSheHeCap] would make sure everyone knew how grateful [From.GetSheHe] is.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]告诉我这里的每个人都那么亲切。[From.GetSheHeCap]保证每个人都知道[From.GetSheHe]对此有多么地感激。

original: [From.GetFirstName] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] really loves spending time with me. I make [From.GetHerHis] days so much better.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]真的很享受和我一起度过的时光，我让[From.GetHerHis]日子美好了很多。

original: [From.GetFirstName] and I always get along well and now [From.GetSheHe] told me that we should stay friends forever.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]和我总是处得很好，现在[From.GetSheHe]跟我说我们应该做一辈子的朋友。

original: I can tell stories to impress [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我可以讲个让[From.GetHerHim]印象深刻的故事。

original: I'm just a responsible adult.
translation: 我只是个有责任感的大人。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is a joy to have around.
I'll kiss [From.GetFirstName] on the cheek.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is kind. But I don't feel that way.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]很亲切。但是我并不这么觉得。

original: I can always count on [From.GetFirstName].

[From.GetFirstName] was very happy for my gesture. [From.GetSheHeCap] agreed that [From.GetHerHis] exceptional personality and skill is worthy of songs and praise. Now the others could see [From.GetHerHim] for what [From.GetSheHe] is.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很满意我的姿态。[From.GetSheHeCap]同意[From.GetHerHis]出众的人格和能力配得上歌颂。现在其他人也能按照[From.GetSheHe]真实的模样看待[From.GetHerHim]了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was humbled by the song I had written. But [From.GetSheHeCap] wanted to make a point of being just an ordinary person, and that I shouldn't give [From.GetHerHim] more credit than [From.GetSheHe] deserves.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很佩服我写的歌曲。但[From.GetSheHeCap]想要强调自己是一个普通人，我不应该给[From.GetHerHim]赞美多过[From.GetSheHe]应得的。

original: [From.GetFirstName] said that I'm also wonderful to be around. Then [From.GetSheHe] gave me a kiss on the cheek and ran away.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说有我在身边也太好了。然后[From.GetSheHe]亲了我的脸颊一下跑走了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seemed a bit uneasy when I told [From.GetHerHim] how I felt. [From.GetSheHeCap] said that it was a nice thing to say, but maybe we should spend less time together.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]在我向[From.GetHerHim]倾诉我的内心时看起来有点不安。[From.GetSheHeCap]说这说起来是很棒，但是也许我们应该少在一起了。

original: After a whole night of religious ritual, I started getting hungry and my mind wandered. Maybe [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is happy with the time I spent here.
translation: 在整夜的宗教仪式之后，我开始感到饥饿而头脑正在神游天外。也许[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]和我一起度过很开心。

original: I wish [From.GetSheHe] was my [From.GetFatherMother].
What a dufus.
What a hero.
Grownups can do anything.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is the best.
This is not what I meant.
I shouldn't have said anything.
I am being tested, I must stay here.
translation: 我正受考验，我必须坚持下来。

original: I can't miss fencing practice.
[From.GetFirstName] is no less impressed by me now. It seems I'm quite the idol for [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]现在对我印象深刻。看来我对[From.GetHerHim]来说是个偶像。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seems to have lost [From.GetHerHis] overwhelming affection for me. For better or worse, it's good to learn moderation. I might not be that special after all.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]看起来失去了[From.GetHerHis]对我的压倒性感情。不论如何，学会适度是件好事，我毕竟不是特别的存在。

original: [From.GetFirstName] said that I'm also wonderful to be around. Then [From.GetSheHe] gave me a kiss on the cheek and ran away.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说有我在身边也太好了。然后[From.GetSheHe]亲了我的脸颊一下跑走了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seemed a bit uneasy when I told [From.GetHerHim] how I felt. [From.GetSheHeCap] said that it was a nice thing to say, but maybe we should spend less time together.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]在我向[From.GetHerHim]倾诉我的内心时看起来有点不安。[From.GetSheHeCap]说这说起来是很棒，但是也许我们应该少在一起了。

original: I hope I'm a good influence on [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我希望自己对[From.GetHerHim]起到好的影响。

original: The older they get...
What a sweetie.
I don't like [From.GetHerHim] anyway...
Inheritance from $FROM$
$VASSAL$ Independence
$VASSAL$ Vassalization

It has been a long day outside and [playful_events_char_1.GetTitledName] says it is time to head back home. [playful_events_char_1.GetSheHeCap] is carrying some heavy bags, maybe this time I can beat [playful_events_char_1.GetHerHim].
translation: 在外经历漫长的一天后，[playful_events_char_1.GetTitledName]说该回家了。[playful_events_char_1.GetSheHeCap]带着一些沉重的行囊，也许我这次可以跑赢[playful_events_char_1.GetHerHim]。

original: It's late at night and I get out of bed to use the chamberpot. [playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] starts calling my name and I see a man hiding under the dining table. He notices me and whispers 'psst, come over here'.
translation: 深夜我起床上厕所时，我看到[playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName]躲在餐桌下。他开始叫我的名字并小声喊道「嘘，过来这里。」

original: Today I had to help out digging in the garden, but gardening is boring. The gardener is boring too, but maybe?
translation: 今天我不得不在花园里帮忙，园艺真的很无聊。园丁也很无聊，不是么？

original: Race me!
Help [playful_events_char_1.GetHerHim] with the bags.
Hide with the man.
Answer [playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName].
I can tickle her.
Hard work is good for discipline.
Gardener is tickly.
Gardener doesn't appreciate tickling.

After I told [From.GetFirstName] it was time to head on home, [From.GetSheHe] looked at me with a grin on [From.GetHerHis] face and told me to race [From.GetHerHim] home, leaving me to carry everything on my own.
translation: 当我告诉[From.GetFirstName]该回家时，[From.GetSheHe]笑盈盈地看着我，并且告诉我，让我与[From.GetHerHim]赛跑回家。说完[From.GetHerHim]就跑了，留下一地的东西让我背回去。

original: After some hours running errands I was heading back home with [From.GetFirstName]. Just as I told [From.GetHerHim] we were going home [From.GetSheHe] took one of the bags to help carry it without me even asking.
translation: 经过几个小时跑腿后，我与[From.GetFirstName]一起走在回家的路上。当我告诉[From.GetHerHim]要回家时，[From.GetSheHe]默默地拿了一个包帮我提着。

original: [playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] stops calling for me after a while. The man says 'I bet you this gold coin you can't hold your breath until I'm outside'.
translation: [playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName]消停了一会儿，拿出一枚金币说：「我赌这枚金币，你无法屏住呼吸直到我走出去」

original: [From.GetFirstName] was not in [From.GetHerHis] his room and I was starting to get worried. When [From.GetSheHe] finally answered I found [From.GetHerHim] staring at a burglar who was trying to hide from me.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]不在[From.GetHerHis]房间让我有些担心。当[From.GetSheHe]回应我时，我发现[From.GetHerHim]盯着一名试图躲开我的窃贼。

original: Race [From.GetHerHim].
Lecture [From.GetHerHim] about responsibilities.
translation: 训斥[From.GetHerHim]要为所做的事承担责任。

original: Bless the child.
Easy money.
Call for [playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName].
Guards!
[From.GetFirstName] chased and caught me. Maybe next time I can run fast enough.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]追上了我。下次我需要跑得更快。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was not happy that I ran away from [From.GetHerHim] without helping. Now I have to stay indoors all day tomorrow.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很不高兴，因为我没有施以援手而是抛下了[From.GetHerHim]。明天一整天我都必须躲在家里。

original: Before I knew it, the man was running out through the door. He didn't even look back once.
translation: 在我发觉之前，那家伙头也不回从门口跑了出去。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seemed shocked when [From.GetSheHe] found me. The guards came and took the man hiding under the table. They said he was a bad man and I should stay away from strangers.
translation: 当[From.GetSheHe]找到我时，[From.GetFirstName]似乎很震惊。卫兵也来了，把藏在桌下的人抓了起来。他们说他是个坏人，我最好离他远一点。

original: We had some time to play before we finished all of the work.
translation: 在我们去玩之前，我们必须完成工作。

original: She was not ticklish, and now she is telling everybody what a hassle I am to have around.
translation: 她不怕痒，现在她告诉所有人我干了什么。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is so fast.
[From.GetFirstName] is a cheater.
Everyone here is so boring.
I win, easy.
I wonder who that was.
Nothing has to be boring.
She is stupid.
[From.GetFirstName] never seems to be grumpy, always playing without a care in the world.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]似乎从来不会生气，总是无忧无虑的。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was a little bit let down that I caught up with [From.GetHerHim] and even called me a cheater. Not always winning is a good thing for children to learn.
translation: 我追上了[From.GetFirstName]让[From.GetHerHim]有些失望，他甚至说我作弊。小孩子不能总想着赢。

original: I heard noises in the middle of the night and when I got up to check on [From.GetFirstName] I had to call out several times. Then [From.GetSheHe] finally answered and I found [From.GetHerHim] under the dining table with a burglar. The guards made quick work of the burglar.
translation: 我在半夜听到声响后，起床去找[From.GetFirstName]，我大声呼喊。然后[From.GetSheHe]终于出声回应了我，我发现[From.GetHerHim]正与窃贼躲在餐桌下。卫兵迅速抓住了窃贼。

original: It will change.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will thank me later.
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] I found [From.GetHerHim].
[indolent_events_char_1.GetFirstName] has come to get my help, today we are going to cut down some trees. Very hard work [indolent_events_char_1.GetSheHe] says.
translation: [indolent_events_char_1.GetFirstName]来请我帮忙，[indolent_events_char_1.GetSheHe]说今天要砍些树，工作会很辛苦。

original: I've been asked to go fetch some supplies at the market but it's a long walk. [indolent_events_char_2.GetFirstName] is already going to get other things.
translation: 我被邀请一同前往市场买东西。但走了很长一段路后[indolent_events_char_2.GetFirstName]想要买一些其他东西。

original: I'm reading a poetry book in my room but the weather is so nice outside. There are some children playing in the sun.
translation: 我在房间读一些诗集，我看到外面天气很好。一些小孩在阳光下玩耍。

original: Ouch, my stomach hurts suddenly.
translation: 哎哟，我肚子突然疼起来了。

original: I'll cut down the biggest one.
Pay [indolent_events_char_2.GetHerHim] to get your groceries.
Join up with [indolent_events_char_2.GetHerHim].
Go see what they are doing.
Keep on reading.
As soon as I came to pick up [From.GetFirstName] to help me out cutting down some trees [From.GetSheHe] starts complaining. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] has a nasty stomach ache.
translation: 当我来找[From.GetFirstName]帮我砍一些树时，[From.GetSheHe]开始抱怨。[From.GetSheHe]说自己胃疼。

original: Today me and [From.GetFirstName] spent some time outside cutting down trees, no complaints from the young [From.GetBoyGirl] and work was finished early.
translation: 今天我和[From.GetFirstName]花了一些时间砍树，年轻的[From.GetBoyGirl]没有抱怨，工作提前完成了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] asked me to get some things for [From.GetHerHim] at the market as I am already going there. [From.GetSheHeCap] is even paying me
translation: [From.GetFirstName]请我在市场上为[From.GetHerHim]买些东西。[From.GetSheHeCap]还愿意付钱给我

original: [From.GetFirstName] came with me to the market today, we both had to go get some groceries and had time to talk a lot.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]今天跟我一起来到市场，我们一起买了很多东西，也聊了许多事。

original: Indolent brat, I'll show [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 懒惰的孩子，我给[From.GetHerHim]点颜色。

original: Maybe there's something wrong with [From.GetHerHim]?
Job well done.
Very easy money.
I refuse!
[From.GetFirstName] is so kind.
[From.GetFirstName] spanked me when I complained about my stomach ache. Then [From.GetSheHe] grabbed my arm and told me we were going outside.
translation: 我抱怨肚子疼，[From.GetFirstName]打了我的屁股，然后[From.GetSheHe]抓住我的胳膊要带我出去。

original: [From.GetFirstName] seemed worried and brought me some tea. I have to drink it to get better. I also got some freshly baked bread for when I feel better.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很担心地给了我一杯茶，说我喝了茶就能好，还给了我新鲜面包，这让我感觉很好。

original: [From.GetFirstName] agreed to go get everything if I gave [From.GetHerHim] some extra coin. I should stay in my room so no one knows I'm still home. I've got some time to spend while I'm in here.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]同意去买东西，前提是我给[From.GetHerHim]更多的钱。我应该呆在房间里，这样就没人知道我还在家里了。我在房间里的时候应该找点事来消磨一下时间。

original: [From.GetFirstName] didn't want to help me out. [From.GetSheHeCap] is already heading out.
The other children are chasing each other, lots of running and jumping.
translation: 孩子们在互相追逐，跑跑跳跳。

original: Now I can't use my arm to cut trees.
translation: 现在我不能用手臂砍树了。

original: I'm coming, I'm coming!
Oh tea and fresh bread!
Maybe I should help [From.GetHerHim].
I could use a nap right now.
Read a book about money.
translation: 读一本关于金钱的书籍。

original: I guess I'll have to go then.
Maybe I'll just watch them.
I'll join in.
[From.GetFirstName] apparently has pains in [From.GetHerHis] arm now after I grabbed it and 'cannot use it to cut trees'.
translation: 我抓住[From.GetFirstName]的手臂后，对方说[From.GetHerHis]手臂很疼，「不能用它砍树了」。

original: [From.GetFirstName] was happy when I brought [From.GetHerHim] some tea and bread. [From.GetSheHe] should recover soon.
translation: 当我给[From.GetHerHim]带来一些茶和面包后，[From.GetFirstName]很高兴。[From.GetSheHe]应该很快能恢复。

original: Some motivation can give good results, apparently the pain is all gone now after some convincing and [From.GetFirstName] will come join me.
translation: 一些鼓励的话总会出现好的结果，经过一番话语后，[From.GetFirstName]的疼痛都消失了，马上就会和我一起来。

original: Hopeless...
Poor child.
Suddenly better, that's great.
[brooding_events_char_1.GetTitledName] promised to take me riding today, but when I came to see [brooding_events_char_1.GetHerHim] [brooding_events_char_1.GetSheHe] was drunk and half asleep.
translation: [brooding_events_char_1.GetTitledName]答应今天带我去骑马，但当我来找[brooding_events_char_1.GetHerHim]时，我发现[brooding_events_char_1.GetSheHe]喝得烂醉。

original: 'Try it again,' [brooding_events_char_2.GetFirstName] says. But I can't do it! I can't whistle.
translation: 「再试一次，」[brooding_events_char_2.GetFirstName]说。但我做不到，我不会吹口哨。

original: Everyone was busy at home, so I snuck out to the commoners market. When I got there some children were being mean to a smaller child in ragged clothes.
translation: 每个人都在家里忙碌，所以我偷偷来到了市场。当我到达那儿时，我发现一些小孩正在欺负一个衣衫褴褛的小个子。

original: Pour some water on [brooding_events_char_1.GetHerHim].
Leave [brooding_events_char_1.GetHerHim] alone.
How come you can do it?
Keep trying.
Stop them.
Noone can know I'm here.

Sure, I forgot about my promise to take [From.GetFirstName] riding. But now... Now [From.GetSheHe] poured water on me when I was resting. I only had a little bit to drink, and and and I am the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
translation: 当然，我忘了我曾答应带[From.GetFirstName]去骑马。但是……现在[From.GetSheHe]在我休息时把我浇湿。我只不过喝了点酒，别忘了我是[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]！

original: I woke up feeling a bit hung over, and it's already evening. I vaguely recall [From.GetFirstName] looking at me before I fell asleep. I think I had plans with [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我醒来时感觉有点头晕，我看了看窗外已经是晚上了。我依稀记得[From.GetFirstName]在我睡着前来看我。我好像答应了[From.GetHerHim]什么事。

original: [From.GetFirstName] wanted to learn to whistle. After trying for a while [From.GetSheHe] asked me 'How come you can do it?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]想学习吹口哨。试了一会儿后[From.GetSheHe]问我「你怎么做到的？」

original: [From.GetFirstName] asked me to teach [From.GetHerHim] how to whistle. I must have inspired [From.GetHerHim], now [From.GetSheHe] has been at it for hours.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]想要我教[From.GetHerHim]如何吹口哨。我一定是激励了[From.GetHerHim]，因为[From.GetSheHe]已经试了几个小时。

original: I'll show [From.GetHerHim]!
I'm sorry [From.GetFirstName].
I feel sick.
It's easy, you can do it.
translation: 这很容易，你可以做到的。

original: Not everyone can do it.
translation: 不是每个人都可以做到。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap]'ll get it right soon.

[From.GetFirstName] tried to say something, but I couldn't hear what it was. Then [From.GetSheHeCap] got up and raised [From.GetHerHis] fist at me before stumbling and falling. Now [From.GetSheHe] is snoring.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]试图说些什么，但我听不清楚。然后[From.GetSheHeCap]起身，朝我举起[From.GetHerHis]拳头，又跌跌撞撞倒了下去。现在[From.GetSheHe]在打呼噜。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is quietly mumbling some words and rubbing [From.GetHerHis] face. 'Sorry, I'm sorry' [From.GetSheHe] says..
translation: [From.GetFirstName]一边嘟囔着一边摩擦[From.GetHerHis]脸。「对不起，对不起」[From.GetSheHe]说……

original: [From.GetFirstName] told me that whistling is easy. That I can do it if I try. But I've tried many times already.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]告诉我吹口哨很容易。只要我多尝试几遍，我就可以做到。但我已经尝试了很多次。

original: [From.GetFirstName] said that not everyone learns to whistle. Some can never do it.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]告诉我不是每个人都能吹口哨。有些人永远也学不会。

original: The bullies all scatter when I tell them to stop. The small child looks at me and asks for food without mentioning the others and what they did. Is this how commoners live?
translation: 当我出声阻止后，他们一哄而散，小孩并没有说他们如何欺负他，只是想要我给他些食物。这就是普通人的生活？

original: My life will never be like this.
Take some money while [From.GetSheHe] is sleeping.
[From.GetFirstName] is not a grown up.
Comfort [From.GetHerHim].
Everyone can do it but me.
translation: 除了我每个人都能做到。

original: I am good at other things.
Donate some money for food and clothes.
translation: 捐一些钱，帮助置备食品和衣物。

original: Tell child to ask their mom and dad.
translation: 告诉孩子，找他父母要去。

original: I have a bad headache, and my episode with [From.GetFirstName] is slowly coming back to me. There is no excuse for my behavior. What's worse is that I even got lectured by a child.
translation: 我头疼得厉害，我渐渐想起了我答应[From.GetFirstName]的事。我没有任何借口为自己行为辩解。更糟糕的是，我被一个孩子说教了。

original: Waking up in my room, I seem to be missing some money. I vaguely remember [From.GetFirstName] being here. Wasn't [From.GetSheHe]?
translation: 我在房间里醒来，我发现我的钱少了一些。我依稀记得[From.GetFirstName]来过这里。是不是[From.GetSheHe]？

original: The last thing I remember before falling asleep is apologizing to [From.GetFirstName]. It seems my apology was not what [From.GetSheHe] wanted.
translation: 在我睡觉前，我记得我曾向[From.GetFirstName]道歉。现在看来[From.GetSheHe]想要的不是道歉。

original: I wake up, and [From.GetFirstName] is still by my side. [From.GetSheHeCap] has brought me some water to drink, and covered me with a blanket. I don't deserve treatment like this. But if [From.GetSheHe] sees good in me...
translation: 我醒来时，[From.GetFirstName]仍然在我身边。[From.GetSheHeCap]给我端来了一杯水，并将毯子盖在我身上。我不该这样。但[From.GetSheHe]也许能看到我好的一面……

original: [From.GetFirstName] seems a bit frustrated by [From.GetHerHis] failed attempts. [From.GetSheHeCap] doesn't seem to respond well to my encouraging words.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]似乎有些沮丧，[From.GetHerHis]尝试失败了很多次。[From.GetSheHeCap]似乎对我的鼓励有些看法。

original: [From.GetFirstName] went back to [From.GetHerHis] room to do other things now.
I have seen better days.
That brat.
I'm in a sad state.
I can change. I will change.
Many things seem to trouble this child.
translation: 许多事情困扰着这个孩子。

original: I'm glad [From.GetSheHe] doesn't dwell too much on these things.
translation: 我很高兴[From.GetSheHe]不纠结于这些事。

original: [willful_events_char_1.GetFirstName] is frowning at me. 'Waste of time. It will never fit, you've grown out of it.' [willful_events_char_1.GetSheHe] says. But it's my favorite hat!
translation: [willful_events_char_1.GetFirstName]对我皱眉。「浪费时间。你戴不上它了，你长大了。」[willful_events_char_1.GetSheHe]说。但这是我最喜欢的帽子！

original: I'm out playing with [willful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] and we're close to the abandoned haunted house, we're not supposed to go there and [willful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] is looking frightened.
translation: 我与[willful_events_char_2.GetFirstName]一起出去玩，我们靠近一间废弃的鬼屋，我们不应该去那里，[willful_events_char_2.GetFirstName]已经面色惊恐。

original: I've been out fishing for hours. I still haven't caught a fish as big as that servant's child got yesterday.
translation: 我已经钓了几个小时。但还是没钓到昨天仆人孩子钓到的大鱼。

original: It will fit if you help me.
translation: 如果你帮我一下我就能戴上。

original: Give the hat to someone younger.
translation: 把帽子给年纪更小的人。

original: Go inside.
Turn back.
If I wait long enough.
Go home.
Catch something.
Waste time.
[From.GetFirstName] insists that I help [From.GetHerHim] get an old hat to fit. A very futile task as [From.GetSheHe]'s too big for it now as I've already told [From.GetHerHim] several times.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]坚持要我帮助[From.GetHerHim]戴上旧帽子。[From.GetSheHe]长大了，他根本戴不上，我已经对[From.GetHerHim]说了好几次。

original: [From.GetFirstName] really wants to go inside the scary haunted house. It looks like it's dangerous and we have been told not to go near it.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]想进入可怕的鬼屋。这看起来很危险，我们最好别进去。

original: No child tells me what to do.
translation: 我用不着小孩子指挥我。

original: Give in to demands.
I don't want to go in there.
I can do this.
[From.GetFirstName] hit me over the head for not listening to [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetFirstName] says we have to go back now, and if we don't [From.GetSheHe] will tell on me.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说我们必须回去，如果不回去[From.GetSheHe]会揍我。

original: After a few more hours, I finally feel something bite. It's a huge fish, probably the biggest fish in [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 几个小时后，我感觉有东西上钩了。这是一条大鱼，应该是[Root.Capital.GetName]能钓到的最大的鱼。

original: I'm just about to give up, but then it happened. I caught a fish, but it's not very big.
translation: 就在我即将放弃时，我抓住了一条鱼。但这只鱼可不大。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap]'s a meanie!
Someone else can make it fit.
translation: 也许可以请其他人帮忙。

original: Come, or I'll say it was your idea.
You're right.
They will tell stories of today.
At least I tried.
[From.GetFirstName] thinks I'm mean for not helping. [From.GetSheHeCap] even stuck [From.GetHerHis] tongue out at me.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]认为我不想帮忙。[From.GetSheHeCap]不太高兴，但我没想到[From.GetHerHis]居然朝我吐舌头。

original: [From.GetFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] will get someone else to help [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetFirstName] still wants to go, and will lie and say it was my idea unless I go with [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]告诉我，除非我和[From.GetHerHim]一起去，不然他就去告家长，说是我的主意。

original: [From.GetFirstName] said I was right and we went back home, away from the scary house.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说我是对的，我们应该远离这里。

original: Well [From.GetSheHe]'s stupid.
At least [From.GetSheHe] knows what [From.GetSheHe] wants.
I'm so angry!
Don't mess with [Root.GetFirstName].
I wake up in the middle of the night, my heart racing and my whole body is feeling strange. What was I really dreaming about?
translation: 我半夜醒来，心脏狂跳不止，身体也有些怪怪的。我梦到了什么？

original: That farmer [Root.GetBoyGirl] I met earlier.
translation: 那个我以前见过的农家[Root.GetBoyGirl]。

original: [lustful_target.GetFirstName], kissing me.
Whatever it was is not important.
I should just try to get to sleep.

Oh it's just something about [Root.GetHerHim] that I can't get off my mind. [Root.GetHerHisCap] hair, the way [Root.GetSheHe] moved. I'm getting all worked up just thinking about [Root.GetHerHim] again.
translation: 我的脑子里都是[Root.GetHerHim]。[Root.GetHerHisCap]头发，[Root.GetSheHe]走路的方式。只是想到[Root.GetHerHim]，我就激动不已。

original: What would it be like to hold [Root.GetHerHim]?
[Root.GetSheHeCap] is the one for me.
If I see [Root.GetHerHim] again we'll have some fun.
translation: 如果我再见到[Root.GetHerHim]，我们会度过开心的一天。

original: I shouldn't. It's a sin.
translation: 我不能这么想。这是一种罪。

original: [lustful_target.GetHerHisCap] lips touching mine. My hands, touching [lustful_target.GetHerHim] gently. I wonder if [lustful_target.GetFirstName] feels the same way about me?
translation: [lustful_target.GetHerHisCap]嘴唇亲吻着我。我的手轻轻地抚摸着[lustful_target.GetHerHim]。我不知道[lustful_target.GetFirstName]是否对我有同样的感觉？

original: I will save myself for [lustful_target.GetHerHim].
[lustful_target.GetSheHeCap] gets me all excited.
These kind of thoughts have been distracting me lately. I don't find them very interesting and they are disturbing my sleep.
translation: 这些想法最近让我失眠。我并不认为这很有趣。

original: I would do well to focus on other things.
Maybe it will change with time.
[From.GetFirstName] has been looking at me in a new way lately. Giggling whenever I talk to [From.GetHerHim], laughing at things that are not meant to be funny.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]最近看我的眼神有些奇怪。当我们交谈时，[From.GetHerHim]总是对那些不是很有趣的事情发出咯咯地笑声。

original: It seems as [From.GetSheHe] is infatuated with me...
In exchange for a favor.
May not take the offer.\n

My liege, my work in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] seem to have come to fruition. By bribing, cajoling, extorting, threatening and forging documents, I have managed to fabricate a claim on the [FromFrom.Location.Kingdom.GetFullName] presently held by [From.GetTitledName]. I leave it up to you whether to press it or not.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我在[FromFrom.Location.GetName]的工作已经完成。通过贿赂、哄骗、勒索、威胁和伪造文件，我已经成功制造[From.GetTitledName]拥有的[FromFrom.Location.Kingdom.GetFullName]的宣称。现在由您决定是否接受。

谦卑的[Root.GetChancellorName]，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: I have finished my education but without any clear purpose. I found some joy in studying diplomacy but without guidance I didn't do very well.
translation: 我已经完成我的教育，但没有明确的目标。我对外交很感兴趣，但没人指导，我学得并不好。

original: I have finished my education but without any clear purpose. I found some joy in studying military arts but without guidance I didn't do very well.
translation: 我已经完成我的教育，但没有明确的目标。我对军事很感兴趣，但没人指导，我学得并不好。

original: I have finished my education but without any clear purpose. I found some joy in studying stewardship but without guidance I didn't do very well.
translation: 我已经完成我的教育，但没有明确的目标。我对管理很感兴趣，但没人指导，我学得并不好。

original: I have finished my education but without any clear purpose. I found some joy in studying intrigue but without guidance I didn't do very well.
translation: 我已经完成我的教育，但没有明确的目标。我对密谋很感兴趣，但没人指导，我学得并不好。

original: I have finished my education but without any clear purpose. I found some joy in studying learning but without guidance I didn't do very well.
translation: 我已经完成我的教育，但没有明确的目标。我对学识很感兴趣，但没人指导，我学得并不好。

original: No one told me it was important.
Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education. With a complete lack of guidance [From.GetSheHe] still tried [From.GetHerHis] best to study diplomacy, unfortunately to no avail.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]已经完成[From.GetHerHis]教育。由于[From.GetSheHe]缺乏指导，即使尽[From.GetHerHis]最大努力学习外交，但似乎仍然没有什么提高。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education. With a complete lack of guidance [From.GetSheHe] still tried [From.GetHerHis] best to study military arts, unfortunately to no avail.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]已经完成[From.GetHerHis]教育。由于[From.GetSheHe]缺乏指导，即使尽[From.GetHerHis]最大努力学习军事，但似乎仍然没有什么提高。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education. With a complete lack of guidance [From.GetSheHe] still tried [From.GetHerHis] best to study stewardship, unfortunately to no avail.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]已经完成[From.GetHerHis]教育。由于[From.GetSheHe]缺乏指导，即使尽[From.GetHerHis]最大努力学习管理，但似乎仍然没有什么提高。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education. With a complete lack of guidance [From.GetSheHe] still tried [From.GetHerHis] best to study intrigue, unfortunately to no avail.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]已经完成[From.GetHerHis]教育。由于[From.GetSheHe]缺乏指导，即使尽[From.GetHerHis]最大努力学习密谋，但似乎仍然没有什么提高。

original: Young [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education. With a complete lack of guidance [From.GetSheHe] still tried [From.GetHerHis] best to study learning, unfortunately to no avail.
translation: 年轻的[From.GetFirstName]已经完成[From.GetHerHis]教育。由于[From.GetSheHe]缺乏指导，即使尽[From.GetHerHis]最大努力学习学术，但似乎仍然没有什么提高。

original: I have failed [From.GetHerHim].
A Loyalist councillor will generally be a faithful servant to the ruler. They will support their liege in all actions except those that will directly decrease their own power.
translation: 一个效忠者内阁成员会是统治者的忠实仆从。他们将全力支持统治者的决定，除非统治者侵犯了他们的利益。

original: A Pragmatist councillor will always aim for the path of least resistance when it comes to strengthening the realm and gaining power for themselves. They are inclined to support wars for reclaiming of de-jure land or counties with the ruler's culture. They might also support wars against weak opponents. This councillor will oppose the creation of other strong vassals in the realm and will support the revoking of titles from already powerful vassals.
translation: 实用主义的内阁成员在增加国土以及攫取自身权力方面将永远选择阻力最小的路线。他们倾向于支持收复法理领地以及针对领主同文化国家的战争。他们也可能支持针对弱小对手的战争。这种内阁成员会反对在领地内创立其他强力的封臣，并且会支持撤销已有的强力封臣的头衔。

original: A Glory Hound councillor will always push for the realm to make prestigious advances for glory. They will oppose attacking weak neighbours, but against more powerful opponents they will not care much for the reason of the war as long as it will strengthen the realm. This councillor also prefers a strong and centralized realm.
translation: 荣誉猎犬式的内阁成员会一直努力要求国家向光辉荣耀的方向前进。他们会反对攻击弱小的邻国，但如果战争是针对强力的对手，他们不会在意宣战理由，只要这仗能增加国土就好。这种内阁成员也会更倾向于强大的中央集权。

original: Inheritance
Council
Obligations
Realm
Tax
Levy
$VOTER_TITLE$\n[GetFirstName]
Advisor
Advisor
Vassal Obligations
Civic and Religious Law
War Taxes
This character is levying war taxes on their subjects.
translation: 这名角色正在对他的臣属征收战争税。

original: Triple Taxation!
This county has been taxed so much that the peasants barely have anything left!
translation: 这个地方的苛捐杂税是如此之重，农民已经家徒四壁了！

original: Necessary Extra Tax
The ruler of this county has taxed the peasants of this county extra in preparation for an upcoming war.
translation: 这个地方的领主已经向农民征收一笔额外的税，准备即将来临的战事。

original: Church Assets Plundered
This church has been plundered of anything valuable!
translation: 这座教堂里值钱的东西都被抢走了！

original: Extort Subjects

Extorting your subjects is a great way of quickly raising funds for your War Chest - beware though, for this action will be seen as tyrannical by your subjects. The mental health of rulers who care for their subjects may take damage from this action.
translation: 向你的臣属敲诈一笔钱是一个可以快速给你的战争小金库筹集资金的绝佳方法——不过要小心，这个行为在你的臣属看来非常暴虐。那些在意自己臣属的领主会因为这种行为损害到自己的心理健康。

original: Build a War Chest
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to build a war chest and prepare [This.GetHerHis] realm for war!
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要建立一个战争金库，并且在[This.GetHerHis]领土做战争准备！

original: Has amassed a suitably large amount of money for [This.GetHerHis] realm: 300¤if ruling a County, 500¤if ruling a Duchy, 700¤if ruling a Kingdom or 1000¤if ruling an Empire.
translation: 已经在[This.GetHerHis]领地聚敛了一笔数额可观的金钱：如统治一个伯爵领，需要 300¤；统治一个公国，需要 500¤；统治一个王国，需要 700¤；统治一个帝国，需要 1000¤。

original: See what options lie before you.
translation: 看看你手头有什么选项。

original: May not have extorted your subjects within the last six months.
translation: 不可在最近六个月内敲诈过你的臣属

original: Collect an 'extra' tax from the peasants of [extra_tax_target.GetName].
translation: 对[extra_tax_target.GetName]的农民开征一项「额外」税

original: The money for that War Chest is not going to raise itself! You have decided to take matters into your own hands and see to that the chest gets filled to the brim with 'donations' from your loyal subjects. How should you proceed?
translation: 战争金库的钱不会自己增加！你必须决定是你自己动手搞钱还是让你忠心的臣属主动用「捐款」填满。你会怎么选？

original: The peasants of [extra_tax_target.GetName] can pay an extra tax!
translation: [extra_tax_target.GetName]的农民可以交上一笔额外的税！

original: [extortion_target.GetFullName] is wealthy, [extortion_target.GetSheHe] can part with some gold!
translation: [extortion_target.GetFullName]挺有钱的，[extortion_target.GetSheHe]可以给一些金子来！

original: The clergy of [seize_church_target.GetName] surely does not need all that wealth!
translation: [seize_church_target.GetName]的教士肯定不需要那么多财产！

original: Maybe this is a bad idea after all...
Doing this is viewed as tyrannical, and will lower all of your subjects' opinion of you by §R-10§!.\n
translation: 这么做会被视为暴虐，也会让所有臣民对你的好感度下降 §R-10§!。\n

original: The peasants of [extra_tax_target.GetName] did, as expected, not appreciate the 'extra' tax we forced upon them. The peasants even elected a leader amongst them who started asking questions why this tax was necessary, and exclaimed that they would now have to starve! Perhaps something should be done before they get the pitchforks?
translation: 和预想的一样，[extra_tax_target.GetName]的农民并不喜欢我们强加给他们的「额外」税。农民们甚至从他们中间选出了一个领袖来代表他们质问为什么这笔税是必要的，并宣称他们现在要开始挨饿了！也许在他们拿起锄头前该做点什么？

original: Explain how this tax is necessary, and give them a temporary tax relief.
translation: 向他们解释这笔税的必要性，并给他们临时减税

original: The tax is obviously necessary, the peasants are just greedy!
translation: 这笔税很显然有必要啊，农民真是贪婪成性！

original: Use brute force to extort [extortion_target.GetFullName].

Even though you have explained it in detail to [extortion_target.GetFirstName], [extortion_target.GetSheHe] still does not understand why you are plundering [extortion_target.GetHerHis] mansion. It would seem evident that giving up some of your wealth in support of the realm is the right thing to do, but [extortion_target.GetFirstName] is having none of it.
translation: 尽管你仔细地向[extortion_target.GetFirstName]解释了各种细节，[extortion_target.GetSheHe]还是不明白为啥你要搜刮[extortion_target.GetHerHis]财产。很显然放弃你的部分财产是对国家有利的正确做法，但是[extortion_target.GetFirstName]并没有做任何事情。

original: Apologize and explain how this will help save the realm.
translation: 道歉并解释这样做会拯救这个国家。

original: Why, you should be honored by me letting you contribute this much!
translation: 搞毛，难道你不该因为能够为国奉献如此多而感到骄傲吗？

original: Order your men to seize the wealth of the [seize_church_target.GetFullName].

As your men load the wealth of the [seize_church_target.GetFullName] onto several wagons, you are approached by a raving group of clergymen. Apparently they are not too happy about you seizing their valuable idols, they claim that you will be punished by [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] if you cannot justify this blasphemy!
translation: 你的手下正把从[seize_church_target.GetFullName]抄走的财物装进几大车皮，一群疯了的教士走向你。很显然他们对你收缴他们那些值钱的东西很不开心，他们宣称如果你没有正当的理由解释这种亵渎行为，你会被 [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]所惩罚！

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] told me that this had to be done!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] be damned, the wealth does more good in my coffers!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]可以去死了，这些财富放在我的箱子里更管用！

original: This gravely upsets §Y[extortion_target.GetFullName]'s§! entire Dynasty!\n
As your character does not have a tyrannical personality, this action may affect you negatively.\n
translation: 你的角色并没有暴虐特质，这件行为会对你产生负面影响。\n

original: Your loyal vassal, [From.GetFullName], has sent you a courier with an offer. [From.GetSheHeCap] is willing to make a significant donation to your War Chest, but in return you must promise to return the favor in the future. A most generous offer!
translation: 你忠诚的封臣，[From.GetFullName]，向你派来一位信使。[From.GetSheHeCap]愿意向你的战争金库提供一笔巨额捐款，但是你必须承诺将来会有所报答。真是慷慨极了！

original: This is just what we need!
[From.GetSheHeCap] is just trying to gain leverage on me! I refuse.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]只是想要让我吃人嘴短！我拒绝。

original: A generous donation from a good friend!
translation: 来自好朋友的慷慨捐赠！

original: [From.GetFullName] has decided to accept your donation offer! Now we have leverage on [From.GetHerHim], we must make sure to use it wisely.
translation: [From.GetFullName]已经决定了接受你的捐款！现在[From.GetHerHim]欠了我们的人情，我们必须明智地利用。

original: [From.GetFullName] has refused your generous donation offer. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that you are just trying to gain leverage on [From.GetHerHim], outrageous!
translation: [From.GetFullName]已经拒绝了你慷慨的捐赠。[From.GetSheHeCap]声称你只是在想要让[From.GetHerHim]欠你的情，真是不识好歹！

original: A shame.
Offer a 200¤ Donation to your Liege
As your Liege is building a War Chest you can seize the opportunity and send a generous donation. By sending 200¤at this precarious time you might gain the favor of your liege!
translation: 你的领主正在建立战争金库，你可以抓住这个机会献上一笔丰厚的捐赠。在这个危急存亡之秋献上 200¤，你将获得领主的青睐！

original: Your liege receives a donation offer from you.\n
translation: 你的领主收到你的捐赠提议。\n

original: May not have had a donation offer refused within the last 5 years.
translation: 不可在最近5年内曾被拒绝过捐款提议。

original: §RYou may not suggest a law change under the current law§!
translation: §R你在当前法律下不可建议法律更改§!

original: §RYou may not suggest a law change while under a favor§!
translation: §R你不可在欠着人情的时候建议法律更改§!

original: §RYou may not vote on a law change while under a favor§!
translation: §R你不可在欠着人情的时候就更改法律投票§!

Loading obsolete save game
You are about to load a save started in a previous version of the game into a newer version of the game. This may cause unforseen consequences and is not recommended. Do you wish to proceed?
translation: 你正要在新版本的游戏中读入过去版本的存档。这将导致不可预知的结果。我们不推荐这样做，是否继续？

original: §RThis save was created using the Conclave DLC and needs it to continue.§!
translation: §R这个存档创建时使用了御前会议 DLC，你需要此 DLC来继续游戏§!

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ is not voting on a Law Change.
You have no Council Laws available. You need to increase Tribal Organization in order to unlock them.
translation: 你没有内阁法律可选。你需要先增加部落组织度来解锁它们。

original: You have no Council Laws available at the current time.
translation: 你现在没有内阁法律可选。

original: This view shows the advisors that affect the stats of your realm.
translation: 这里显示影响你国家统计指标的顾问。

original: The advisors have specialized jobs in your realm that affect its stats. Your advisors perform their jobs better if the appropriate stats are higher.
translation: 顾问在你的国家各有职责，这会影响国家的统计指标。你的顾问在属性值更高的情况下会更好地履行职责。

original: §YMinor Titles§!
This view shows a collection of your honorary titles and commander titles.
translation: 这里显示你的荣誉头衔和指挥头衔。

original: Honorary titles can be given to your characters to change their opinion and commanders are used to lead your troops. You can appoint characters to these titles directly from this view.
translation: 荣誉头衔可以授予给角色，改变他对你的好感。指挥头衔则用于带领你的军队。你可以直接从这个界面指定获得这些头衔的角色。

original: §YMy Council§!
This view shows you an overview of your council.
translation: 这个界面展示您内阁的概况。

original: You can see all councilors and empty council positions. You can also see the position of a councilor which affects how they vote.
translation: 你可以浏览所有的内阁成员和空出的内阁席位。你也可以看到内阁成员的情况，这会影响他们的投票倾向。

original: §YLiege Council§!
This view shows you an overview of your liege's council.
translation: 这个界面展示你领主的内阁概况

original: You can see all councilors and empty council positions of your liege's council. You can also see the position of a councilor which affects how they vote.
translation: 你可以浏览你领主的所有内阁成员和空出的内阁席位。你也可以看到内阁成员的情况，这会影响他们的投票倾向。

original: §YEnforce§!
Approved by Council
The council of $TITLE$ has rejected the institution of the "$LAW$" Law.

In the Realm and Obligations tabs you will find laws affecting not only yourself but also how much levies and taxes your vassals provide. You will be able to customize your Realm according to your preference. Click next to end this part.
translation: 在国土与义务标签页中，你会发现法律并不仅仅影响你自己，同样也决定你的封臣可以提供多少征召兵和税收。你可以根据自己的喜好定制自己的王国。点击下一步结束这一部分。

original: In the Realm tab you can find the Investiture Law. This can either be set to papal, which means the pope elects the bishops, or free, which means that you can select your bishops by yourself. The pope will not be happy of course. Click next to learn about crusades.
translation: 在国土标签页中你会找到神职叙任权。这可以设定为教宗，这意味着教宗选择主教，或者自主，这意味着你可以自己选择你的主教。当然教宗对此肯定不会开心。点击下一步学习十字军相关内容。

original: In the Realm tab you see the laws that are not related to Succession. On the top you have the laws marked with a crown, which means they are crown laws. They concern how much freedom a king or emperor has. Your vassals will be hard to convince, but if they like you enough and you have high prestige, they will pose but a minor problem.
translation: 在国土标签页中你会看到跟继承法无关的法律。在最上方有一个皇冠标记的法律，这意味着这是王权法。他们决定国王或者皇帝有多少行动自由。你的封臣会非常难被说服，但如果他们足够喜欢你，而且你有很高的威望，他们会稍稍作态反对，但不会是个大问题。

original: The bottom half of the Character View is dedicated to close relations. Vassals are feudal lords in fief to the selected character. The Court tab lists the people at the court of the character. Pacts lists rulers with whom you have a diplomatic relation with, like an alliance, and the 'Abroad' tab lists courtiers who are currently away for some reason.
translation: 角色界面的下半部分用于展示近血缘关系。「封臣」指的是所选角色手下有头衔的封建领主。「宫廷」列出了在这位角色的宫廷里的角色。「条约」列出了这位角色有外交关系的领主，比如互有盟约，以及「境外」标签列出目前正在外出的廷臣。

original: Some characters dream of attaining a Council position. Granting them their wish will make them grateful towards you.
translation: 有些角色梦想获得一个内阁位置。让他们满足愿望会让他们对你感恩戴德。

original: Temporary modifiers have an expiration date. Certain events for example can give you an opinion modifier towards other characters and these will usually last a limited time (like a year or two). Click next to continue.
translation: 临时修正有失效日期。特定事件可能会让你获得对其他角色的好感度修正，通常这会持续有限的一段时间（比如一到两年）。点击下一步继续。

original: If you have allies they will always join automatically in all your wars. Some allies (like Tribal Vassals) will have to be called into your wars to join them (if they accept).
translation: 如果你有盟友，他们会自动加入你所有的战争。有些盟友（比如部落封臣）会需要召唤进入战争（如果他们同意的话）。

original: $OWES_FAVOR|Y$ is not already influenced by a §YFavor§!
\nI offer you a gift of $GOLD$§W¤§! to repay the Favor I owe you.
translation: \n我将赠送你价值 $GOLD$§W¤§! 的礼物来偿还我欠你的人情。

original: \nI offer you a gift of $GOLD$§W¤§! and in return you will owe me a Favor.
translation: \n我将赠送你价值 $GOLD$§W¤§! 的礼物来获取你的人情。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! cannot be influenced by a §YFavor§! from §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!
$OWES_FAVOR|Y$ cannot owe $HAS_FAVOR|Y$ a §YFavor§!
Your daughter [target_daughter_killed_her_friend.GetFirstName] is furious with you: 'Damn you, [Root.GetFatherMother] - you killed [From.GetFirstName], I will never forgive you!'.
translation: 你的女儿[target_daughter_killed_her_friend.GetFirstName]对你大发雷霆：「该死的，[Root.GetFatherMother]——你杀了[From.GetFirstName]，我永远不会原谅你！」

original: The coffers are left open and unattended again. Surely, this is [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s way of telling me that a small bonus is in order. [Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap] knows the other councillors would object if it were mentioned in their presence.
translation: 金库再次被开放且无人值守。很显然，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]是在告诉我他想要一笔小钱。[Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap]知道如果跟其他内阁成员提起这件事肯定会被拒绝。

original: [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] responds to [Root.GetFirstName]'s question.

Visitors arrived today and, despite their peculiar clothes, strange language and strangely colored skin, they were warmly greeted by [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]. I wanted to talk to them and find out where they came from and who they were, but I was not sure if [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] would approve.
translation: 今天有访客到了，尽管他们穿着奇异，语言跟肤色都很陌生，他们还是被[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]热情地迎接了。我想要跟他们聊聊，弄清他们从哪里来，是什么人，但是我不清楚[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]是否会批准。

original: I offered to hand [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s buzzard to the falconer, but was careless enough to forget to put on its hood, and then lost my grip on the jesses as the bird flew to freedom.
translation: 我正准备把 [From.GetTitledFirstName]的秃鹰交给训鹰者，但是实在是不小心，忘了盖上罩子，然后我失去了对缰绳的控制，鸟儿飞上了天。

original: The inquisitors are returning home after failing to accomplish much in [Root.GetName] - aside from riling up the peasants.
translation: 宗教裁判官回到了宫廷，他们在[Root.GetName]几乎无功而返——除了激怒了当地的农民。

original: After successfully stomping out the heresy in [Root.GetName], the inquisitors are returning home.
translation: 成功镇压了[Root.GetName]的异端之后，宗教裁判官回到了宫廷。

original: The theologians dispatched to [Root.GetName] by the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] are returning home with their tails between their legs.
translation: [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]派往[Root.GetName]的神学家灰溜溜夹着尾巴回来了。

original: The theologians dispatched to [Root.GetName] by the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] are returning home in triumph. The heretics have renounced their false beliefs!
translation: [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]派往[Root.GetName]的神学家得胜归来了。异端放弃了他们错误的信仰！

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W has Relieved §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W of [Recipient.GetHerHis] duty as Commander
I, [From.GetBestName], accept your proposal for an Alliance!
translation: 我，[From.GetBestName]，接受你组建同盟的提议！

original: I, [From.GetBestName], unfortunately have to decline your proposal for an Alliance!
translation: [From.GetBestName]，很遗憾不得不拒绝你组建同盟的提议！

original: I should bring [From.GetHerHim] some candy later.
translation: 我一会儿应该给[From.GetHerHim]带些糖来。

original: [target_spouse.GetTitledName], the [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife] of [target_ruler.GetTitledName], has been spending a few days in [capital.GetName]. It has been a very nice experience meeting [target_spouse.GetHerHim] - maybe our peoples are not that different after all.
translation: [target_spouse.GetTitledName]，[target_ruler.GetTitledName]的[target_spouse.GetHusbandWife]，已经在[capital.GetName]停留了数日。和[target_spouse.GetHerHim]的会面非常地愉快——也许我们两地的人民并没有什么不同。

original:
Dear [target_ruler.GetTitledName],
During your [target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]'s recent visit to [capital.GetName] we had a great time discussing the similarities between our people. I suggest a non-aggression pact between us for the near future, and we will welcome any visitors from your realm with open arms.

Kind regards,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[target_ruler.GetTitledName]，
在你的[target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]最近来访[capital.GetName]的过程中，我们非常愉快地交谈了我们两地人民的相似性。我建议最近双方签订一项互不侵犯条约，我们会非常欢迎你们领地的访客。

热情的问候，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],

If this agreement can lead to a better understanding between our peoples, I will put effort into opening our borders to visitors from your realm.

Yours truly,
 [target_ruler.GetTitledName].
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledName]，

如果这项协议可以让我们两地人民更好的互相了解，我会愿意开放边界给来自您领地中的访客。

您真诚的，
[target_ruler.GetTitledName]。

original: I've received a request for additional funds from my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]. [Root.job_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] is worried that it is too easy for spies to make their way inside your home and wants to take precautionary measures against hostile operations.
translation: 我已经收到一个来自我的[Root.GetSpymasterName][Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]的增加资金的要求。[Root.job_spymaster.GetSheHeCap]担忧间谍能非常轻易地进入你的家中，并要求我必须采取对敌对行为防患于未然。

original: §YInheritance Laws§!
These laws control how succession is done and who will inherit what.
translation: 这些法律规定了采取何种继承法及继承人的权力。

original: §YRealm Laws§!
These laws control how the realm is ruled and what the liege is allowed to do.
translation: 这些法律规定了领地如何运作及领主的权力。

original: §YObligation Laws§!
These laws control how much taxes and levies vassals have to provide to the liege.
translation: 这些法律规定了税收多少以及封臣需要提供多少兵力给领主。

original: §YCouncil Laws§!
These laws control if there is a council or not and what issues the council is allowed to influence.
translation: 这些法律规定了内阁是否存在且内阁允许影响哪些议题。

original:
For too long, you have restricted the political influence of your vassals. The time has come to give the [Root.GetCouncilName] more power! Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences. Rest assure that I have gathered others who are equally upset...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
很长时间以来，你一直限制着封臣的政治影响。但这一切都将结束，是时候给[Root.GetCouncilName]更多权力了！要么和平地服从这项要求，要么面对这将带来的后果。放心吧，我已经把那些感到不安的人集中了起来……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

translation: 目标不是另一个宗教的对立教宗\n

translation: 这名投票者是反对派，他将会反对领主\n

translation: 我的同盟在一场战争中快输了，这会帮助他们！\n

translation: 这场战争针对我的一个家族成员\n

original: Once set, you will not be able to change the childhood focus.\n§RIf not set, the child's upbringing will be more randomly selected.§!
translation: 一旦设置，你将不能够改变童年焦点。\n§R如果未设置焦点，儿童会被随机教育。§!

original: Once set, you will not be able to change the education focus.\n§RIf not set, the child will get a random education with a significantly worse outcome than if you select an education.§!
translation: 教育重心一旦设置，你将不能够改变它。\n§R如果未设置焦点，儿童会被随机教育，并得到一个相对于你选择的教育而言非常差的结果。§!

original: §RChildhood focus cannot be changed when set.§!\n§YThe childhood focus will automatically be removed when the character turns 12 and allow you to select an education instead.§!
translation: §R童年焦点不能在设置后改变。§!\n§Y童年焦点将会在角色12岁时自动移除，到时候你可以另选择教育焦点。§!

original: §REducation focus cannot be changed when set.§!\n§YThe education focus will automatically be removed when the character becomes adult.§!
translation: §R教育重心不能在设置后改变。§!\n§Y教育重心将在角色成年后自动移除。§!

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nClearly you can understand what an outlandish suggestion you are making. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is supposed to grow up to be a fine and cultured [FromFrom.GetManWoman], something which will obviously not be possible with your strange rituals and repulsive manners.
translation: 致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n\n你应该很了解自己提出了一个外地乡下的古怪建议。[FromFrom.GetFirstName]注定要成长为一名优秀有教养的[FromFrom.GetManWoman]，这与你奇异的仪式和恶心的举止明显是不兼容的。
